trans-unit.source: The array whose elements need to be cleared.
trans-unit.target: 需要清除其元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: The starting index of the range of elements to clear.
trans-unit.target: 要清除的一系列元素的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements to clear.
trans-unit.target: 要清除的元素数。

trans-unit.source: Sets a range of elements in an array to the default value of each element type.
trans-unit.target: 将数组中的某个范围的元素设置为每个元素类型的默认值。

trans-unit.source: This method resets each element in an array to the element type's default value.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将在数组中的每个元素重置为元素类型的默认值。

trans-unit.source: It sets elements of reference types (including <xref:System.String> elements) to `null`, and sets elements of value types to the default values shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 它设置每个元素的引用类型 (包括<xref:System.String>元素) 到`null`，并将值类型的元素设置为下表中显示的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Type
trans-unit.target: 类型

trans-unit.source: Value
All integral and floating point numeric types
trans-unit.target: 所有整型和浮点数字类型

trans-unit.source: 0 (zero)
Other value types
trans-unit.target: 其他值类型

trans-unit.source: Default value of the type's fields
trans-unit.target: 该类型的字段的默认值

trans-unit.source: The range of cleared elements wrap from row to row in a multi-dimensional array.
trans-unit.target: 范围清除元素换行从行至行多维数组中。

trans-unit.source: This method only clears the values of the elements; it does not delete the elements themselves.
trans-unit.target: 此方法仅清除元素; 的值它不会删除元素本身。

trans-unit.source: An array has a fixed size; therefore, elements cannot be added or removed.
trans-unit.target: 数组具有固定的大小，则因此，不能添加或删除元素。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Array.Clear%2A> method to reset integer values in a one-dimensional, two-dimensional, and three-dimensional array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Array.Clear%2A>方法来重置一维、 二维和三维数组中的整数值。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a `TimeZoneTime` structure that includes a <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> field and a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> field.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义`TimeZoneTime`结构，其中包含<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>字段和<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>字段。

trans-unit.source: It then calls the <xref:System.Array.Clear%2A> method to clear one element in a two-element array of `TimeZoneTime` values.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它调用<xref:System.Array.Clear%2A>方法清除在两个元素数组中的一个元素`TimeZoneTime`值。

trans-unit.source: The method sets the value of the cleared element to the default value of a <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> object, which is `null`, and the default value of a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object, which is <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 该方法将清除元素的值设置的默认值为<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>对象，它是`null`，和的默认值<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>对象，它是<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than the lower bound of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小于 <paramref name="array" /> 的下限。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The sum of <paramref name="index" /> and <paramref name="length" /> is greater than the size of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 和 <paramref name="length" /> 大于 <paramref name="array" /> 的大小。

trans-unit.source: Creates a shallow copy of the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的浅表副本。

trans-unit.source: A shallow copy of the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的浅表副本。

trans-unit.source: A shallow copy of an <xref:System.Array> copies only the elements of the <xref:System.Array>, whether they are reference types or value types, but it does not copy the objects that the references refer to.
trans-unit.target: 浅表复制<xref:System.Array>的元素复制<xref:System.Array>，无论它们是引用类型还是值类型，但它不会复制引用所引用的对象。

trans-unit.source: The references in the new <xref:System.Array> point to the same objects that the references in the original <xref:System.Array> point to.
trans-unit.target: 在新的引用<xref:System.Array>指向相同对象的原始中的引用<xref:System.Array>指向。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a deep copy of an <xref:System.Array> copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反的深层副本<xref:System.Array>将复制的元素，并直接或间接引用的元素的所有内容。

trans-unit.source: The clone is of the same <xref:System.Type> as the original <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆属于相同<xref:System.Type>与原始<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Array.Length%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example clones a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=nameWithType> array and demonstrates the behavior of a shallow copy.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例克隆<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=nameWithType>数组和演示的浅表副本的行为。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the data to copy.
trans-unit.target: 包含要复制的数据的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that represents the index in the <c>sourceArray</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 一个 32 位整数，它表示 <c>sourceArray</c> 中复制开始处的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that receives the data.
trans-unit.target: 接收数据的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that represents the index in the <c>destinationArray</c> at which storing begins.
trans-unit.target: 一个 32 位整数，它表示 <c>destinationArray</c> 中存储开始处的索引。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that represents the number of elements to copy.
trans-unit.target: 一个 32 位整数，它表示要复制的元素数目。

trans-unit.source: Copies a range of elements from an <see cref="T:System.Array" /> starting at the specified source index and pastes them to another <see cref="T:System.Array" /> starting at the specified destination index.
trans-unit.target: 复制 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的一系列元素（从指定的源索引开始），并将它们粘贴到另一 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中（从指定的目标索引开始）。

trans-unit.source: Guarantees that all changes are undone if the copy does not succeed completely.
trans-unit.target: 保证在复制未成功完成的情况下撤消所有更改。

trans-unit.source: The `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` parameters must have the same number of dimensions.
trans-unit.target: `sourceArray`和`destinationArray`参数必须具有相同数量的维度。

trans-unit.source: The `sourceArray` type must be the same as or derived from the `destinationArray` type; otherwise, an <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: `sourceArray`类型必须相同或派生自`destinationArray`类型; 否则为<xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException>引发。

trans-unit.source: Unlike <xref:System.Array.Copy%2A>, <xref:System.Array.ConstrainedCopy%2A> verifies the compatibility of the array types before performing any operation.
trans-unit.target: 与不同<xref:System.Array.Copy%2A>，<xref:System.Array.ConstrainedCopy%2A>在执行任何操作之前验证数组类型的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: When copying between multidimensional arrays, the array behaves like a long one-dimensional array, where the rows (or columns) are conceptually laid end-to-end.
trans-unit.target: 在多维阵列之间复制时，该数组表现得像是长时间一维数组，其中的行 （或多个列） 从概念上讲列出了端到端。

trans-unit.source: For example, if an array has three rows (or columns) with four elements each, copying six elements from the beginning of the array would copy all four elements of the first row (or column) and the first two elements of the second row (or column).
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果数组有三个行 （列） 带有四个元素从数组的开头的每个，复制的六个元素会将复制所有四个元素的第一行 （或列） 和第二个行 （或列） 的前两个元素。

trans-unit.source: To start copying from the second element of the third row (or column), `sourceIndex` must be the upper bound of the first row (or column) plus the length of the second row (or column) plus two.
trans-unit.target: 第三个行 （或列），第二个元素从其开始复制`sourceIndex`必须是第一个行 （或列） 的上限加上的第二个行 （或列） 的长度值，再加上 2。

trans-unit.source: If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` overlap, this method behaves as if the original values of `sourceArray` were preserved in a temporary location before `destinationArray` is overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sourceArray`和`destinationArray`重叠，此方法的行为就像的原始值`sourceArray`在临时位置之前保留`destinationArray`将被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to the standard C/C++ function `memmove`, not `memcpy`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法相当于标准的 C/c + + 函数`memmove`，而不`memcpy`。

trans-unit.source: The arrays can be reference-type arrays or value-type arrays.
trans-unit.target: 数组可以是引用类型的数组或值类型数组。

trans-unit.source: If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` are both reference-type arrays or are both arrays of type <xref:System.Object>, a shallow copy is performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sourceArray`和`destinationArray`两个引用类型数组或类型的两个数组<xref:System.Object>，执行的浅表副本。

trans-unit.source: A shallow copy of an <xref:System.Array> is a new <xref:System.Array> containing references to the same elements as the original <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 浅表复制<xref:System.Array>是一种新<xref:System.Array>包含对原始与相同的元素的引用<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: The elements themselves or anything referenced by the elements are not copied.
trans-unit.target: 元素本身或任何引用的元素不会复制。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a deep copy of an <xref:System.Array> copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反的深层副本<xref:System.Array>将复制的元素，并直接或间接引用的元素的所有内容。

trans-unit.source: If this method throws an exception while copying, the `destinationArray` remains unchanged; therefore, <xref:System.Array.ConstrainedCopy%2A> can be used within a constrained execution region (<xref:System.Runtime.ConstrainedExecution.Cer>).
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法将引发时复制时，出现异常`destinationArray`保持不变; 因此，<xref:System.Array.ConstrainedCopy%2A>可以受约束的执行区域内使用 (<xref:System.Runtime.ConstrainedExecution.Cer>)。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="destinationArray" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> and <paramref name="destinationArray" /> have different ranks.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 和 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 具有不同的秩。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="sourceArray" /> type is neither the same as nor derived from the <paramref name="destinationArray" /> type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 类型与 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 类型不同，且不派生自后者。

trans-unit.source: At least one element in <paramref name="sourceArray" /> cannot be cast to the type of <paramref name="destinationArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 中至少有一个元素无法转换为 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 的类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceIndex" /> is less than the lower bound of the first dimension of <paramref name="sourceArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceIndex" /> 少于 <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 的第一个维度的下限。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="destinationIndex" /> is less than the lower bound of the first dimension of <paramref name="destinationArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationIndex" /> 少于 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 的第一个维度的下限。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is greater than the number of elements from <paramref name="sourceIndex" /> to the end of <paramref name="sourceArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 大于从 <paramref name="sourceIndex" /> 到 <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 末尾的元素数。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is greater than the number of elements from <paramref name="destinationIndex" /> to the end of <paramref name="destinationArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 大于从 <paramref name="destinationIndex" /> 到 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 末尾的元素数。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the source array.
trans-unit.target: 源数组元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 目标数组元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to convert to a target type.
trans-unit.target: 要转换为目标类型的从零开始的一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Converter`2" /> that converts each element from one type to another type.
trans-unit.target: 用于将每个元素从一种类型转换为另一种类型的 <see cref="T:System.Converter`2" />。

trans-unit.source: Converts an array of one type to an array of another type.
trans-unit.target: 将一种类型的数组转换为另一种类型的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of the target type containing the converted elements from the source array.
trans-unit.target: 目标类型的数组，包含从源数组转换而来的元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Converter%602> is a delegate to a method that converts an object to the target type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Converter%602>是将对象转换为目标类型的方法的委托。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `array` are individually passed to the <xref:System.Converter%602>, and the converted elements are saved in the new array.
trans-unit.target: 元素`array`单独传递给<xref:System.Converter%602>，和转换后的元素保存在新的数组。

trans-unit.source: The source `array` remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 源`array`保持不变。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example defines a method named `PointFToPoint` that converts a <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structure to a <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structure.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例定义一个名为方法`PointFToPoint`，用于将转换<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>结构<xref:System.Drawing.Point>结构。

trans-unit.source: The example then creates an array of <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structures, creates a `Converter<PointF, Point>` delegate (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)` in Visual Basic) to represent the `PointFToPoint` method, and passes the delegate to the <xref:System.Array.ConvertAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 然后，示例创建的数组<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>结构，创建`Converter<PointF, Point>`委托 (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)`在 Visual Basic 中) 来表示`PointFToPoint`方法，并将传递到委托<xref:System.Array.ConvertAll%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.ConvertAll%2A> method passes each element of the input list to the `PointFToPoint` method and puts the converted elements into a new list of <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.ConvertAll%2A>方法将传递到输入列表的每个元素`PointFToPoint`方法并将转换后的元素放入一个新的列表<xref:System.Drawing.Point>结构。

trans-unit.source: Both lists are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 显示这两个列表。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="converter" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="converter" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Copies a range of elements in one <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to another <see cref="T:System.Array" /> and performs type casting and boxing as required.
trans-unit.target: 将一个 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的一部分元素复制到另一个 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中，并根据需要执行类型强制转换和装箱。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the data to copy.
trans-unit.target: 包含要复制的数据的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that receives the data.
trans-unit.target: 接收数据的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that represents the number of elements to copy.
trans-unit.target: 一个 32 位整数，它表示要复制的元素数目。

trans-unit.source: Copies a range of elements from an <see cref="T:System.Array" /> starting at the first element and pastes them into another <see cref="T:System.Array" /> starting at the first element.
trans-unit.target: 从第一个元素开始复制 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的一系列元素，将它们粘贴到另一 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中（从第一个元素开始）。

trans-unit.source: The length is specified as a 32-bit integer.
trans-unit.target: 长度指定为 32 位整数。

trans-unit.source: The `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` parameters must have the same number of dimensions.
trans-unit.target: `sourceArray`和`destinationArray`参数必须具有相同数量的维度。

trans-unit.source: In addition, `destinationArray` must already have been dimensioned and must have a sufficient number of elements to accommodate the copied data.
trans-unit.target: 此外，`destinationArray`必须已具有已指定维度，并且必须具有足够数量的元素，以容纳所复制的数据。

trans-unit.source: When copying between multidimensional arrays, the array behaves like a long one-dimensional array, where the rows (or columns) are conceptually laid end to end.
trans-unit.target: 在多维阵列之间复制时，数组表现得像是长时间一维数组，其中的行 （或多个列） 从概念上讲首尾相连。

trans-unit.source: For example, if an array has three rows (or columns) with four elements each, copying six elements from the beginning of the array would copy all four elements of the first row (or column) and the first two elements of the second row (or column).
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果数组有三个行 （列） 带有四个元素从数组的开头的每个，复制的六个元素会将复制所有四个元素的第一行 （或列） 和第二个行 （或列） 的前两个元素。

trans-unit.source: If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` overlap, this method behaves as if the original values of `sourceArray` were preserved in a temporary location before `destinationArray` is overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sourceArray`和`destinationArray`重叠，此方法的行为就像的原始值`sourceArray`在临时位置之前保留`destinationArray`将被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to the standard C/C++ function `memmove`, not `memcpy`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法相当于标准的 C/c + + 函数`memmove`，而不`memcpy`。

trans-unit.source: The arrays can be reference-type arrays or value-type arrays.
trans-unit.target: 数组可以是引用类型的数组或值类型数组。

trans-unit.source: Type downcasting is performed, as required.
trans-unit.target: 执行类型转换，则所需的方式。

trans-unit.source: When copying from a reference-type array to a value-type array, each element is unboxed and then copied.
trans-unit.target: 当从引用类型的数组复制到值类型的数组，每个元素是取消装箱，然后将其复制。

trans-unit.source: When copying from a value-type array to a reference-type array, each element is boxed and then copied.
trans-unit.target: 当从值类型数组复制到引用类型的数组，每个元素被装箱，然后将其复制。

trans-unit.source: When copying from a reference-type or value-type array to an <xref:System.Object> array, an <xref:System.Object> is created to hold each value or reference and then copied.
trans-unit.target: 在复制到一个引用类型或值类型数组中<xref:System.Object>数组，<xref:System.Object>然后复制并创建来保存每个值或引用。

trans-unit.source: When copying from an <xref:System.Object> array to a reference-type or value-type array and the assignment is not possible, an <xref:System.InvalidCastException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 当从复制<xref:System.Object>到引用类型或值类型数组和分配的数组不能，<xref:System.InvalidCastException>引发。

trans-unit.source: If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` are both reference-type arrays or are both arrays of type <xref:System.Object>, a shallow copy is performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sourceArray`和`destinationArray`两个引用类型数组或类型的两个数组<xref:System.Object>，执行的浅表副本。

trans-unit.source: A shallow copy of an <xref:System.Array> is a new <xref:System.Array> containing references to the same elements as the original <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 浅表复制<xref:System.Array>是一种新<xref:System.Array>包含对原始与相同的元素的引用<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: The elements themselves or anything referenced by the elements are not copied.
trans-unit.target: 元素本身或任何引用的元素不会复制。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a deep copy of an <xref:System.Array> copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反的深层副本<xref:System.Array>将复制的元素，并直接或间接引用的元素的所有内容。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> is thrown if the arrays are of incompatible types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException>引发如果数组的不可兼容类型。

trans-unit.source: Type compatibility is defined as follows:
trans-unit.target: 类型兼容性定义如下：

trans-unit.source: A type is compatible with itself.
trans-unit.target: 一种类型适用于本身。

trans-unit.source: A value type is compatible with <xref:System.Object> and with an interface type implemented by that value type.
trans-unit.target: 值类型适用于<xref:System.Object>和与该值类型实现的接口类型。

trans-unit.source: A value type is considered connected to an interface only if it implements that interface directly.
trans-unit.target: 值类型被视为连接的接口，仅当它直接实现该接口。

trans-unit.source: Disconnected types are not compatible.
trans-unit.target: 断开连接的类型不兼容。

trans-unit.source: Two intrinsic (predefined) value types are compatible if copying from the source type to the destination type is a widening conversion.
trans-unit.target: 两个内部函数 （预定义） 的值类型相兼容。 如果将源类型从复制到目标类型是一个的扩大转换。

trans-unit.source: A widening conversion never loses information, whereas a narrowing conversion can lose information.
trans-unit.target: 扩大转换永远不会丢失信息，而收缩转换可能会丢失信息。

trans-unit.source: For example, converting a 32-bit signed integer to a 64-bit signed integer is a widening conversion, and converting a 64-bit signed integer to a 32-bit signed integer is a narrowing conversion.
trans-unit.target: 例如，将一个 32 位带符号的整数转换为 64 位有符号整数是扩大转换，并将一个 64 位带符号的整数转换为 32 位有符号整数都是收缩转换。

trans-unit.source: For more information about conversions, see <xref:System.Convert>.
trans-unit.target: 有关转换的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Convert>。

trans-unit.source: A nonintrinsic (user-defined) value type is compatible only with itself.
trans-unit.target: 内部 （用户定义） 的值类型是只与其本身兼容。

trans-unit.source: Enumerations have an implicit conversion to <xref:System.Enum> and to their underlying type.
trans-unit.target: 枚举具有隐式转换为<xref:System.Enum>和为其基础类型。

trans-unit.source: If every element in `sourceArray` requires a downcast (for example, from a base class to a derived class or from an interface to an object) and one or more elements cannot be cast to the corresponding type in `destinationArray`, an <xref:System.InvalidCastException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果在每个元素`sourceArray`需要向下转换 （例如，从派生类的基类或接口的对象） 和一个或多个元素不能强制转换为中的对应类型`destinationArray`、<xref:System.InvalidCastException>引发。

trans-unit.source: If this method throws an exception while copying, the state of `destinationArray` is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法将引发异常时复制的状态`destinationArray`是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="destinationArray" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> and <paramref name="destinationArray" /> have different ranks.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 和 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 具有不同的秩。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> and <paramref name="destinationArray" /> are of incompatible types.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 和 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 属于不兼容的类型。

trans-unit.source: At least one element in <paramref name="sourceArray" /> cannot be cast to the type of <paramref name="destinationArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 中至少有一个元素无法转换为 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 的类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is greater than the number of elements in <paramref name="sourceArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 大于 <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 中的元素数。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is greater than the number of elements in <paramref name="destinationArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 大于 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 中的元素数。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the data to copy.
trans-unit.target: 包含要复制的数据的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that receives the data.
trans-unit.target: 接收数据的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit integer that represents the number of elements to copy.
trans-unit.target: 一个 64 位整数，它表示要复制的元素数目。

trans-unit.source: The integer must be between zero and <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: 该整数必须介于零和 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> 之间（包括这两个值）。

trans-unit.source: Copies a range of elements from an <see cref="T:System.Array" /> starting at the first element and pastes them into another <see cref="T:System.Array" /> starting at the first element.
trans-unit.target: 从第一个元素开始复制 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的一系列元素，将它们粘贴到另一 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中（从第一个元素开始）。

trans-unit.source: The length is specified as a 64-bit integer.
trans-unit.target: 长度指定为 64 位整数。

trans-unit.source: The `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` parameters must have the same number of dimensions.
trans-unit.target: `sourceArray`和`destinationArray`参数必须具有相同数量的维度。

trans-unit.source: In addition, `destinationArray` must already have been dimensioned and must have a sufficient number of elements to accommodate the copied data.
trans-unit.target: 此外，`destinationArray`必须已具有已指定维度，并且必须具有足够数量的元素，以容纳所复制的数据。

trans-unit.source: When copying between multidimensional arrays, the array behaves like a long one-dimensional array, where the rows (or columns) are conceptually laid end to end.
trans-unit.target: 在多维阵列之间复制时，数组表现得像是长时间一维数组，其中的行 （或多个列） 从概念上讲首尾相连。

trans-unit.source: For example, if an array has three rows (or columns) with four elements each, copying six elements from the beginning of the array would copy all four elements of the first row (or column) and the first two elements of the second row (or column).
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果数组有三个行 （列） 带有四个元素从数组的开头的每个，复制的六个元素会将复制所有四个元素的第一行 （或列） 和第二个行 （或列） 的前两个元素。

trans-unit.source: If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` overlap, this method behaves as if the original values of `sourceArray` were preserved in a temporary location before `destinationArray` is overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sourceArray`和`destinationArray`重叠，此方法的行为就像的原始值`sourceArray`在临时位置之前保留`destinationArray`将被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to the standard C/C++ function `memmove`, not `memcpy`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法相当于标准的 C/c + + 函数`memmove`，而不`memcpy`。

trans-unit.source: The arrays can be reference-type arrays or value-type arrays.
trans-unit.target: 数组可以是引用类型的数组或值类型数组。

trans-unit.source: Type downcasting is performed, as required.
trans-unit.target: 执行类型转换，则所需的方式。

trans-unit.source: When copying from a reference-type array to a value-type array, each element is unboxed and then copied.
trans-unit.target: 当从引用类型的数组复制到值类型的数组，每个元素是取消装箱，然后将其复制。

trans-unit.source: When copying from a value-type array to a reference-type array, each element is boxed and then copied.
trans-unit.target: 当从值类型数组复制到引用类型的数组，每个元素被装箱，然后将其复制。

trans-unit.source: When copying from a reference-type or value-type array to an <xref:System.Object> array, an <xref:System.Object> is created to hold each value or reference and then copied.
trans-unit.target: 在复制到一个引用类型或值类型数组中<xref:System.Object>数组，<xref:System.Object>然后复制并创建来保存每个值或引用。

trans-unit.source: When copying from an <xref:System.Object> array to a reference-type or value-type array and the assignment is not possible, an <xref:System.InvalidCastException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 当从复制<xref:System.Object>到引用类型或值类型数组和分配的数组不能，<xref:System.InvalidCastException>引发。

trans-unit.source: If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` are both reference-type arrays or are both arrays of type <xref:System.Object>, a shallow copy is performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sourceArray`和`destinationArray`两个引用类型数组或类型的两个数组<xref:System.Object>，执行的浅表副本。

trans-unit.source: A shallow copy of an <xref:System.Array> is a new <xref:System.Array> containing references to the same elements as the original <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 浅表复制<xref:System.Array>是一种新<xref:System.Array>包含对原始与相同的元素的引用<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: The elements themselves or anything referenced by the elements are not copied.
trans-unit.target: 元素本身或任何引用的元素不会复制。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a deep copy of an <xref:System.Array> copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反的深层副本<xref:System.Array>将复制的元素，并直接或间接引用的元素的所有内容。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> is thrown if the arrays are of incompatible types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException>引发如果数组的不可兼容类型。

trans-unit.source: Type compatibility is defined as follows:
trans-unit.target: 类型兼容性定义如下：

trans-unit.source: A type is compatible with itself.
trans-unit.target: 一种类型适用于本身。

trans-unit.source: A value type is compatible with <xref:System.Object> and with an interface type implemented by that value type.
trans-unit.target: 值类型适用于<xref:System.Object>和与该值类型实现的接口类型。

trans-unit.source: A value type is considered connected to an interface only if it implements that interface directly.
trans-unit.target: 值类型被视为连接的接口，仅当它直接实现该接口。

trans-unit.source: Disconnected types are not compatible.
trans-unit.target: 断开连接的类型不兼容。

trans-unit.source: Two intrinsic (predefined) value types are compatible if copying from the source type to the destination type is a widening conversion.
trans-unit.target: 两个内部函数 （预定义） 的值类型相兼容。 如果将源类型从复制到目标类型是一个的扩大转换。

trans-unit.source: A widening conversion never loses information, whereas a narrowing conversion can lose information.
trans-unit.target: 扩大转换永远不会丢失信息，而收缩转换可能会丢失信息。

trans-unit.source: For example, converting a 32-bit signed integer to a 64-bit signed integer is a widening conversion, and converting a 64-bit signed integer to a 32-bit signed integer is a narrowing conversion.
trans-unit.target: 例如，将一个 32 位带符号的整数转换为 64 位有符号整数是扩大转换，并将一个 64 位带符号的整数转换为 32 位有符号整数都是收缩转换。

trans-unit.source: For more information about conversions, see <xref:System.Convert>.
trans-unit.target: 有关转换的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Convert>。

trans-unit.source: A nonintrinsic (user-defined) value type is compatible only with itself.
trans-unit.target: 内部 （用户定义） 的值类型是只与其本身兼容。

trans-unit.source: Enumerations have an implicit conversion to <xref:System.Enum> and to their underlying type.
trans-unit.target: 枚举具有隐式转换为<xref:System.Enum>和为其基础类型。

trans-unit.source: If every element in `sourceArray` requires a downcast (for example, from a base class to a derived class or from an interface to an object) and one or more elements cannot be cast to the corresponding type in `destinationArray`, an <xref:System.InvalidCastException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果在每个元素`sourceArray`需要向下转换 （例如，从派生类的基类或接口的对象） 和一个或多个元素不能强制转换为中的对应类型`destinationArray`、<xref:System.InvalidCastException>引发。

trans-unit.source: If this method throws an exception while copying, the state of `destinationArray` is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法将引发异常时复制的状态`destinationArray`是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="destinationArray" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> and <paramref name="destinationArray" /> have different ranks.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 和 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 具有不同的秩。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> and <paramref name="destinationArray" /> are of incompatible types.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 和 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 属于不兼容的类型。

trans-unit.source: At least one element in <paramref name="sourceArray" /> cannot be cast to the type of <paramref name="destinationArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 中至少有一个元素无法转换为 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 的类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is less than 0 or greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 小于 0 或大于 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is greater than the number of elements in <paramref name="sourceArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 大于 <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 中的元素数。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is greater than the number of elements in <paramref name="destinationArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 大于 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 中的元素数。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the data to copy.
trans-unit.target: 包含要复制的数据的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that represents the index in the <c>sourceArray</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 一个 32 位整数，它表示 <c>sourceArray</c> 中复制开始处的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that receives the data.
trans-unit.target: 接收数据的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that represents the index in the <c>destinationArray</c> at which storing begins.
trans-unit.target: 一个 32 位整数，它表示 <c>destinationArray</c> 中存储开始处的索引。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that represents the number of elements to copy.
trans-unit.target: 一个 32 位整数，它表示要复制的元素数目。

trans-unit.source: Copies a range of elements from an <see cref="T:System.Array" /> starting at the specified source index and pastes them to another <see cref="T:System.Array" /> starting at the specified destination index.
trans-unit.target: 复制 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的一系列元素（从指定的源索引开始），并将它们粘贴到另一 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中（从指定的目标索引开始）。

trans-unit.source: The length and the indexes are specified as 32-bit integers.
trans-unit.target: 长度和索引指定为 32 位整数。

trans-unit.source: The `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` parameters must have the same number of dimensions.
trans-unit.target: `sourceArray`和`destinationArray`参数必须具有相同数量的维度。

trans-unit.source: In addition, `destinationArray` must already have been dimensioned and must have a sufficient number of elements starting from the `destinationIndex` position to accommodate the copied data.
trans-unit.target: 此外，`destinationArray`必须已具有已指定维度，并且必须具有足够数量的元素从开始`destinationIndex`以容纳所复制的数据的位置。

trans-unit.source: When copying between multidimensional arrays, the array behaves like a long one-dimensional array, where the rows (or columns) are conceptually laid end-to-end.
trans-unit.target: 在多维阵列之间复制时，该数组表现得像是长时间一维数组，其中的行 （或多个列） 从概念上讲列出了端到端。

trans-unit.source: For example, if an array has three rows (or columns) with four elements each, copying six elements from the beginning of the array would copy all four elements of the first row (or column) and the first two elements of the second row (or column).
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果数组有三个行 （列） 带有四个元素从数组的开头的每个，复制的六个元素会将复制所有四个元素的第一行 （或列） 和第二个行 （或列） 的前两个元素。

trans-unit.source: To start copying from the second element of the third row (or column), `sourceIndex` must be the upper bound of the first row (or column) plus the length of the second row (or column) plus two.
trans-unit.target: 第三个行 （或列），第二个元素从其开始复制`sourceIndex`必须是第一个行 （或列） 的上限加上的第二个行 （或列） 的长度值，再加上 2。

trans-unit.source: If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` overlap, this method behaves as if the original values of `sourceArray` were preserved in a temporary location before `destinationArray` is overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sourceArray`和`destinationArray`重叠，此方法的行为就像的原始值`sourceArray`在临时位置之前保留`destinationArray`将被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to the standard C/C++ function `memmove`, not `memcpy`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法相当于标准的 C/c + + 函数`memmove`，而不`memcpy`。

trans-unit.source: The arrays can be reference-type arrays or value-type arrays.
trans-unit.target: 数组可以是引用类型的数组或值类型数组。

trans-unit.source: Type downcasting is performed, as required.
trans-unit.target: 执行类型转换，则所需的方式。

trans-unit.source: When copying from a reference-type array to a value-type array, each element is unboxed and then copied.
trans-unit.target: 当从引用类型的数组复制到值类型的数组，每个元素是取消装箱，然后将其复制。

trans-unit.source: When copying from a value-type array to a reference-type array, each element is boxed and then copied.
trans-unit.target: 当从值类型数组复制到引用类型的数组，每个元素被装箱，然后将其复制。

trans-unit.source: When copying from a reference-type or value-type array to an <xref:System.Object> array, an <xref:System.Object> is created to hold each value or reference and then copied.
trans-unit.target: 在复制到一个引用类型或值类型数组中<xref:System.Object>数组，<xref:System.Object>然后复制并创建来保存每个值或引用。

trans-unit.source: When copying from an <xref:System.Object> array to a reference-type or value-type array and the assignment is not possible, an <xref:System.InvalidCastException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 当从复制<xref:System.Object>到引用类型或值类型数组和分配的数组不能，<xref:System.InvalidCastException>引发。

trans-unit.source: If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` are both reference-type arrays or are both arrays of type <xref:System.Object>, a shallow copy is performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sourceArray`和`destinationArray`两个引用类型数组或类型的两个数组<xref:System.Object>，执行的浅表副本。

trans-unit.source: A shallow copy of an <xref:System.Array> is a new <xref:System.Array> containing references to the same elements as the original <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 浅表复制<xref:System.Array>是一种新<xref:System.Array>包含对原始与相同的元素的引用<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: The elements themselves or anything referenced by the elements are not copied.
trans-unit.target: 元素本身或任何引用的元素不会复制。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a deep copy of an <xref:System.Array> copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反的深层副本<xref:System.Array>将复制的元素，并直接或间接引用的元素的所有内容。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to copy from one <xref:System.Array> of type <xref:System.Object> to another <xref:System.Array> of type integer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何从某个复制<xref:System.Array>类型的<xref:System.Object>到另一个<xref:System.Array>的整数类型。

trans-unit.source: To start copying from the second element of the third row (or column), `sourceIndex` must be the upper bound of the first row (or column) plus the length of the second row (or column) plus two.
trans-unit.target: 第三个行 （或列），第二个元素从其开始复制`sourceIndex`必须是第一个行 （或列） 的上限加上的第二个行 （或列） 的长度值，再加上 2。

trans-unit.source: If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` overlap, this method behaves as if the original values of `sourceArray` were preserved in a temporary location before `destinationArray` is overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sourceArray`和`destinationArray`重叠，此方法的行为就像的原始值`sourceArray`在临时位置之前保留`destinationArray`将被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to the standard C/C++ function `memmove`, not `memcpy`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法相当于标准的 C/c + + 函数`memmove`，而不`memcpy`。

trans-unit.source: The arrays can be reference-type arrays or value-type arrays.
trans-unit.target: 数组可以是引用类型的数组或值类型数组。

trans-unit.source: Type downcasting is performed, as required.
trans-unit.target: 执行类型转换，则所需的方式。

trans-unit.source: When copying from a reference-type array to a value-type array, each element is unboxed and then copied.
trans-unit.target: 当从引用类型的数组复制到值类型的数组，每个元素是取消装箱，然后将其复制。

trans-unit.source: When copying from a value-type array to a reference-type array, each element is boxed and then copied.
trans-unit.target: 当从值类型数组复制到引用类型的数组，每个元素被装箱，然后将其复制。

trans-unit.source: When copying from a reference-type or value-type array to an <xref:System.Object> array, an <xref:System.Object> is created to hold each value or reference and then copied.
trans-unit.target: 在复制到一个引用类型或值类型数组中<xref:System.Object>数组，<xref:System.Object>然后复制并创建来保存每个值或引用。

trans-unit.source: When copying from an <xref:System.Object> array to a reference-type or value-type array and the assignment is not possible, an <xref:System.InvalidCastException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 当从复制<xref:System.Object>到引用类型或值类型数组和分配的数组不能，<xref:System.InvalidCastException>引发。

trans-unit.source: If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` are both reference-type arrays or are both arrays of type <xref:System.Object>, a shallow copy is performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sourceArray`和`destinationArray`两个引用类型数组或类型的两个数组<xref:System.Object>，执行的浅表副本。

trans-unit.source: A shallow copy of an <xref:System.Array> is a new <xref:System.Array> containing references to the same elements as the original <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 浅表复制<xref:System.Array>是一种新<xref:System.Array>包含对原始与相同的元素的引用<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: The elements themselves or anything referenced by the elements are not copied.
trans-unit.target: 元素本身或任何引用的元素不会复制。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a deep copy of an <xref:System.Array> copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反的深层副本<xref:System.Array>将复制的元素，并直接或间接引用的元素的所有内容。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> is thrown if the arrays are of incompatible types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException>引发如果数组的不可兼容类型。

trans-unit.source: Type compatibility is defined as follows:
trans-unit.target: 类型兼容性定义如下：

trans-unit.source: A type is compatible with itself.
trans-unit.target: 一种类型适用于本身。

trans-unit.source: A value type is compatible with <xref:System.Object> and with an interface type implemented by that value type.
trans-unit.target: 值类型适用于<xref:System.Object>和与该值类型实现的接口类型。

trans-unit.source: A value type is considered connected to an interface only if it implements that interface directly.
trans-unit.target: 值类型被视为连接的接口，仅当它直接实现该接口。

trans-unit.source: Disconnected types are not compatible.
trans-unit.target: 断开连接的类型不兼容。

trans-unit.source: Two intrinsic (predefined) value types are compatible if copying from the source type to the destination type is a widening conversion.
trans-unit.target: 两个内部函数 （预定义） 的值类型相兼容。 如果将源类型从复制到目标类型是一个的扩大转换。

trans-unit.source: A widening conversion never loses information, whereas a narrowing conversion can lose information.
trans-unit.target: 扩大转换永远不会丢失信息，而收缩转换可能会丢失信息。

trans-unit.source: For example, converting a 32-bit signed integer to a 64-bit signed integer is a widening conversion, and converting a 64-bit signed integer to a 32-bit signed integer is a narrowing conversion.
trans-unit.target: 例如，将一个 32 位带符号的整数转换为 64 位有符号整数是扩大转换，并将一个 64 位带符号的整数转换为 32 位有符号整数都是收缩转换。

trans-unit.source: For more information about conversions, see <xref:System.Convert>.
trans-unit.target: 有关转换的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Convert>。

trans-unit.source: A nonintrinsic (user-defined) value type is compatible only with itself.
trans-unit.target: 内部 （用户定义） 的值类型是只与其本身兼容。

trans-unit.source: Enumerations have an implicit conversion to <xref:System.Enum> and to their underlying type.
trans-unit.target: 枚举具有隐式转换为<xref:System.Enum>和为其基础类型。

trans-unit.source: If every element in `sourceArray` requires a downcast (for example, from a base class to a derived class or from an interface to an object) and one or more elements cannot be cast to the corresponding type in `destinationArray`, an <xref:System.InvalidCastException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果在每个元素`sourceArray`需要向下转换 （例如，从派生类的基类或接口的对象） 和一个或多个元素不能强制转换为中的对应类型`destinationArray`、<xref:System.InvalidCastException>引发。

trans-unit.source: If this method throws an exception while copying, the state of `destinationArray` is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法将引发异常时复制的状态`destinationArray`是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to copy from one <xref:System.Array> of type <xref:System.Object> to another <xref:System.Array> of type integer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何从某个复制<xref:System.Array>类型的<xref:System.Object>到另一个<xref:System.Array>的整数类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="destinationArray" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> and <paramref name="destinationArray" /> have different ranks.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 和 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 具有不同的秩。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> and <paramref name="destinationArray" /> are of incompatible types.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 和 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 属于不兼容的类型。

trans-unit.source: At least one element in <paramref name="sourceArray" /> cannot be cast to the type of <paramref name="destinationArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 中至少有一个元素无法转换为 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 的类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceIndex" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for the <paramref name="sourceArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceIndex" /> 超出了 <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 的有效索引范围。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="destinationIndex" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for the <paramref name="destinationArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationIndex" /> 超出了 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 的有效索引范围。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is less than 0 or greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 小于 0 或大于 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is greater than the number of elements from <paramref name="sourceIndex" /> to the end of <paramref name="sourceArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 大于从 <paramref name="sourceIndex" /> 到 <paramref name="sourceArray" /> 末尾的元素数。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is greater than the number of elements from <paramref name="destinationIndex" /> to the end of <paramref name="destinationArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 大于从 <paramref name="destinationIndex" /> 到 <paramref name="destinationArray" /> 末尾的元素数。

trans-unit.source: Copies all the elements of the current one-dimensional array to the specified one-dimensional array.
trans-unit.target: 将当前一维数组的所有元素复制到指定的一维数组中。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the current array.
trans-unit.target: 一维数组，它是从当前数组复制的元素的目标。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that represents the index in <c>array</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 一个 32 位整数，它表示 <c>array</c> 中复制开始处的索引。

trans-unit.source: Copies all the elements of the current one-dimensional array to the specified one-dimensional array starting at the specified destination array index.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的目标数组索引处开始，将当前一维数组的所有元素复制到指定的一维数组中。

trans-unit.source: The index is specified as a 32-bit integer.
trans-unit.target: 索引指定为 32 位整数。

trans-unit.source: This method copies all the elements of the current array instance to the `array` destination array, starting at index `index`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会复制到当前数组实例的所有元素`array`目标数组索引处开始`index`。

trans-unit.source: The `array` destination array must already have been dimensioned and must have a sufficient number of elements to accommodate the copied elements.
trans-unit.target: `array`目标数组必须已具有已指定维度，并且必须具有足够数量的元素，以适应复制的元素。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 否则，该方法将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This method supports the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此方法支持<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>接口。

trans-unit.source: If implementing <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> is not explicitly required, use <xref:System.Array.Copy%2A> to avoid an extra indirection.
trans-unit.target: 如果实现<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>是不明确要求，使用<xref:System.Array.Copy%2A>以避免额外间接寻址。

trans-unit.source: If this method throws an exception while copying, the state of `array` is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法将引发异常时复制的状态`array`是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Array.Length%2A>.It performs a shallow copy only.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>。它执行的浅表副本。

trans-unit.source: Copies all the elements of the current one-dimensional array to the specified one-dimensional array starting at the specified destination array index.

trans-unit.target: 不支持 <paramref name="elementType" />。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.target: 要创建的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of 32-bit integers that represent the size of each dimension of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to create.
trans-unit.target: 一个 32 位整数数组，它表示要创建的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中每个维度的大小。

trans-unit.source: Creates a multidimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> of the specified <see cref="T:System.Type" /> and dimension lengths, with zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 创建索引从零开始、具有指定 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 和维长的多维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The dimension lengths are specified in an array of 32-bit integers.
trans-unit.target: 维的长度在一个 32 位整数数组中指定。

trans-unit.source: A new multidimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> of the specified <see cref="T:System.Type" /> with the specified length for each dimension, using zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的新多维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，该数组每个维具有指定长度，且使用从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Unlike most classes, <xref:System.Array> provides the <xref:System.Array.CreateInstance%2A> method, instead of public constructors, to allow for late bound access.
trans-unit.target: 与大多数类时，不同<xref:System.Array>提供<xref:System.Array.CreateInstance%2A>方法，而不是公共构造函数，以允许后期绑定访问。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the `lengths` array must equal the number of dimensions in the new <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 中的元素数`lengths`数组必须等于在新的维度数<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.target: 每个元素`lengths`数组必须在新中指定的相应维度的长度<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是中的所有值的乘积`lengths`。

trans-unit.source: Creates a multidimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> of the specified <see cref="T:System.Type" /> and dimension lengths, with the specified lower bounds.
trans-unit.target: 创建具有指定下限、指定 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 和维长的多维 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Unlike most classes, <xref:System.Array> provides the <xref:System.Array.CreateInstance%2A> method, instead of public constructors, to allow for late bound access.
trans-unit.target: 与大多数类时，不同<xref:System.Array>提供<xref:System.Array.CreateInstance%2A>方法，而不是公共构造函数，以允许后期绑定访问。

trans-unit.target: `lengths`和`lowerBounds`数组必须具有相同数量的元素。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the `lengths` array must equal the number of dimensions in the new <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 中的元素数`lengths`数组必须等于在新的维度数<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.target: 每个元素`lowerBounds`数组必须在新中指定的相应维度的下限<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: Generally, the .NET Framework class library and many programming languages do not handle nonzero lower bounds.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，.NET Framework 类库和许多编程语言不处理非零下限。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="elementType" /> 为开放式泛型类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 数组元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个空数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an empty <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个空 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 数组元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的从零开始的一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Predicate`1" /> that defines the conditions of the elements to search for.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Predicate`1" />，定义要搜索元素的条件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified array contains elements that match the conditions defined by the specified predicate.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定数组包含的元素是否与指定谓词定义的条件匹配。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="array" /> contains one or more elements that match the conditions defined by the specified predicate; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="array" /> 包含一个或多个与指定谓词所定义的条件相匹配的元素，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Predicate%601> is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Predicate%601>是返回方法的委托`true`如果该对象传递给委托中定义的条件匹配。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `array` are individually passed to the <xref:System.Predicate%601>, and processing is stopped when a match is found.
trans-unit.target: 元素`array`单独传递给<xref:System.Predicate%601>，并且当找到匹配项时停止处理。

trans-unit.source: In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the <xref:System.Predicate%601> delegate explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，它不需要创建<xref:System.Predicate%601>显式委托。

trans-unit.source: These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically.
trans-unit.target: 这些语言推断从上下文正确的委托，并自动创建。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: The following example specifies the match conditions for the <xref:System.Array.Exists%2A> method usinglambda expressions to check whether a planet starts with a given letter or whether the planet is found on the given array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例指定的匹配条件<xref:System.Array.Exists%2A>方法 usinglambda 表达式来检查是否世界各地给定的字母开头，或是否在世界各地找到上给定数组。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Array.Exists%2A> method to indicate whether any names in a string array begin with a specified character.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Array.Exists%2A>方法，以指示是否使用指定的字符开始的字符串数组中的任何名称。

trans-unit.source: The example instantiates a `StringSearcher` object by passing the string to search for to its class constructor.
trans-unit.target: 该示例实例化`StringSearcher`通过传递给其类构造函数搜索的字符串对象。

trans-unit.source: The `StringSearcher.StartsWith` method has same signature as the <xref:System.Predicate%601> delegate.
trans-unit.target: `StringSearcher.StartsWith`方法具有相同的签名<xref:System.Predicate%601>委托。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Array.Exists%2A> method is called, each member of the array is passed to the delegate until it returns `true` or iterates all the elements in the array.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Array.Exists%2A>方法调用，该数组的每个成员传递给委托，直到它返回`true`或循环访问数组中的所有元素。

trans-unit.source: You can also use a lambda expression rather than explicitly define a method whose signature corresponds to that of the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 可以还使用 lambda 表达式，而不是显式定义其签名相对应的方法的委托。

trans-unit.source: The following example replaces the `StringSearcher` class and its `StartsWith` method with a lambda expression.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例替换`StringSearcher`类并将其`StartsWith`使用 lambda 表达式的方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="match" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="match" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 数组元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based array to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的从零开始的一维数组。

trans-unit.source: The predicate that defines the conditions of the element to search for.
trans-unit.target: 用于定义要搜索的元素的条件的谓词。

trans-unit.source: Searches for an element that matches the conditions defined by the specified predicate, and returns the first occurrence within the entire <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 搜索与指定谓词所定义的条件相匹配的元素，并返回整个 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的第一个匹配元素。

trans-unit.source: The first element that matches the conditions defined by the specified predicate, if found; otherwise, the default value for type <paramref name="T" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到与指定谓词定义的条件匹配的第一个元素，则为该元素；否则为类型 <paramref name="T" /> 的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Predicate%601> is a delegate to a method or a lambda expression that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate or lambda expression.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Predicate%601>是对的方法或 lambda 表达式返回一个委托`true`如果该对象传递给委托或 lambda 表达式中定义的条件匹配。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `array` are individually passed to the <xref:System.Predicate%601>, starting with the first element and ending with the last element.
trans-unit.target: 元素`array`单独传递给<xref:System.Predicate%601>，从第一个元素开始和结束的最后一个元素。

trans-unit.source: Processing is stopped when a match is found.
trans-unit.target: 找到匹配项，已停止处理。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a <xref:System.Predicate%601> delegate with the <xref:System.Array.Find%2A> generic method to search an array of <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Predicate%601>委托以及<xref:System.Array.Find%2A>泛型方法搜索的数组<xref:System.Drawing.Point>结构。

trans-unit.source: The method the delegate represents, `ProductGT10`, returns `true` if the product of the X and Y fields is greater than 100,000.
trans-unit.target: 表示委托，该方法`ProductGT10`，返回`true`是否大于 100,000 的 X 和 Y 字段的产品。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.Find%2A> method calls the delegate for each element of the array, returning the first point that meets the test condition.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.Find%2A>方法返回满足测试条件的第一个点的数组的每个元素调用委托。

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic and C# users do not have to create the delegate explicitly or specify the type argument of the generic method.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 和 C# 用户不需要显式创建委托，或者指定泛型方法的类型自变量。

trans-unit.source: The compilers determine the necessary types from the method arguments you supply.
trans-unit.target: 编译器确定必需你提供的方法自变量的类型。

trans-unit.source: Rather than explicitly defining a method with the necessary signature, instantiating a <xref:System.Predicate%601> delegate, and passing the delegate to the <xref:System.Array.Find%2A> method, it is customary to use a lambda expression.
trans-unit.target: 而不是显式定义具有必要的签名的方法实例化<xref:System.Predicate%601>委托，并将传递到委托<xref:System.Array.Find%2A>方法，它是通常使用 lambda 表达式。

trans-unit.source: The following example is identical to the previous one, except that it uses a lambda expression as the `match` argument.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例是上一，相同，但它使用 lambda 表达式作为`match`自变量。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="match" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="match" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 数组元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的从零开始的一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Predicate`1" /> that defines the conditions of the elements to search for.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Predicate`1" />，定义要搜索元素的条件。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves all the elements that match the conditions defined by the specified predicate.
trans-unit.target: 检索与指定谓词定义的条件匹配的所有元素。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Array" /> containing all the elements that match the conditions defined by the specified predicate, if found; otherwise, an empty <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到一个其中所有元素均与指定谓词定义的条件匹配的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，则为该数组；否则为一个空 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Predicate%601> is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Predicate%601>是返回方法的委托`true`如果该对象传递给委托中定义的条件匹配。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `array` are individually passed to the <xref:System.Predicate%601>, and the elements that match the conditions are saved in the returned array.
trans-unit.target: 元素`array`单独传递给<xref:System.Predicate%601>，和的条件相匹配的元素保存在返回的数组。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an array of 50 random numbers with values that can range from 0 to 1,000.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用范围可以从 0 到 1000 的值创建 50 的随机数的数组。

trans-unit.source: It then calls the <xref:System.Array.FindAll%2A> method with a lambda expression that returns the values that range from 300 to 600.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它调用<xref:System.Array.FindAll%2A>方法返回的值，范围从 300 为 600 的 lambda 表达式。

trans-unit.source: Note that the lambda expression is passed a parameter named `x`; this represents the individual array member that is passed to the <xref:System.Predicate%601>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，lambda 表达式将传递一个名为参数`x`; 这表示传递给单个数组成员<xref:System.Predicate%601>。

trans-unit.source: Also note that the local `lBound` and `uBound` variables are accessible within the lambda expression.
trans-unit.target: 另请注意，本地`lBound`和`uBound`变量是在 lambda 表达式中访问。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Array.Find%2A>, <xref:System.Array.FindLast%2A>, and <xref:System.Array.FindAll%2A> generic methods.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Array.Find%2A>， <xref:System.Array.FindLast%2A>，和<xref:System.Array.FindAll%2A>泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of strings is created, containing 8 dinosaur names, two of which (at positions 1 and 5) end with "saurus".
trans-unit.target: 创建一个字符串数组，其中包含 8 不复存在名称，其中 （在位置 1 和 5） 两个以"saurus"结尾。

trans-unit.source: The code example also defines a search predicate method named `EndsWithSaurus`, which accepts a string parameter and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the input string ends in "saurus".
trans-unit.target: 该代码示例还定义一个名为搜索谓词的方法`EndsWithSaurus`、 它接受字符串参数和返回一个布尔值，该值指示是否以"saurus"结尾的输入的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.Find%2A> generic method traverses the array from the beginning, passing each element in turn to the `EndsWithSaurus` method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.Find%2A>泛型方法的开头，将每个元素传递给反过来遍历数组`EndsWithSaurus`方法。

trans-unit.source: The search stops when the `EndsWithSaurus` method returns `true` for the element "Amargasaurus".
trans-unit.target: 搜索将停止时`EndsWithSaurus`方法返回`true`元素"Amargasaurus"。

trans-unit.source: In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the `Predicate<string>` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，它不需要创建`Predicate<string>`委托 (`Predicate(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中) 显式。

trans-unit.source: These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically.
trans-unit.target: 这些语言推断从上下文正确的委托，并自动创建。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.FindLast%2A> generic method is used to search the array backward from the end.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.FindLast%2A>泛型方法用于搜索向后结尾的数组。

trans-unit.source: It finds the element "Dilophosaurus" at position 5.
trans-unit.target: 它找到的元素"Dilophosaurus"在位置 5。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.FindAll%2A> generic method is used to return an array containing all the elements that end in "saurus".
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.FindAll%2A>泛型方法用于返回数组，其中包含以"saurus"结尾的所有元素。

trans-unit.source: The elements are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 元素的显示。

trans-unit.source: The code example also demonstrates the <xref:System.Array.Exists%2A> and <xref:System.Array.TrueForAll%2A> generic methods.
trans-unit.target: 代码示例还演示<xref:System.Array.Exists%2A>和<xref:System.Array.TrueForAll%2A>泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="match" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="match" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches for an element that matches the conditions defined by a specified predicate, and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within an <see cref="T:System.Array" /> or a portion of it.
trans-unit.target: 搜索与指定谓词定义的条件匹配的元素，然后返回 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 或其某个部分中第一个匹配项的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 数组元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的从零开始的一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Predicate`1" /> that defines the conditions of the element to search for.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Predicate`1" />，定义要搜索元素的条件。

trans-unit.source: Searches for an element that matches the conditions defined by the specified predicate, and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the entire <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 搜索与指定谓词所定义的条件相匹配的元素，并返回整个 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中第一个匹配元素的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of an element that matches the conditions defined by <paramref name="match" />, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到与 <paramref name="match" /> 定义的条件相匹配的第一个元素，则为该元素的从零开始的索引；否则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> is searched forward starting at the first element and ending at the last element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>搜索向前从第一个元素开始和结束时间的最后一个元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Predicate%601> is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Predicate%601>是返回方法的委托`true`如果该对象传递给委托中定义的条件匹配。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `array` are individually passed to the <xref:System.Predicate%601>.
trans-unit.target: 元素`array`单独传递给<xref:System.Predicate%601>。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates all three overloads of the <xref:System.Array.FindIndex%2A> generic method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的所有三个重载<xref:System.Array.FindIndex%2A>泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of strings is created, containing 8 dinosaur names, two of which (at positions 1 and 5) end with "saurus".
trans-unit.target: 创建一个字符串数组，其中包含 8 不复存在名称，其中 （在位置 1 和 5） 两个以"saurus"结尾。

trans-unit.source: The code example also defines a search predicate method named `EndsWithSaurus`, which accepts a string parameter and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the input string ends in "saurus".
trans-unit.target: 该代码示例还定义一个名为搜索谓词的方法`EndsWithSaurus`、 它接受字符串参数和返回一个布尔值，该值指示是否以"saurus"结尾的输入的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.FindIndex%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Predicate%7B%60%600%7D%29> method overload traverses the array from the beginning, passing each element in turn to the `EndsWithSaurus` method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.FindIndex%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Predicate%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法重载从开始时，将每个元素传递给反过来遍历数组`EndsWithSaurus`方法。

trans-unit.source: The search stops when the `EndsWithSaurus` method returns `true` for the element at position 1.
trans-unit.target: 搜索将停止时`EndsWithSaurus`方法返回`true`位于位置 1 处的元素。

trans-unit.source: In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the `Predicate<string>` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，它不需要创建`Predicate<string>`委托 (`Predicate(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中) 显式。

trans-unit.source: These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically.
trans-unit.target: 这些语言推断从上下文正确的委托，并自动创建。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.FindIndex%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Predicate%7B%60%600%7D%29> method overload is used to search the array beginning at position 2 and continuing to the end of the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.FindIndex%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Predicate%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法重载用于搜索位置 2 处开始并一直到数组末尾的数组。

trans-unit.source: It finds the element at position 5.
trans-unit.target: 它找到位置 5 处的元素。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Array.FindIndex%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Predicate%7B%60%600%7D%29> method overload is used to search the range of three elements beginning at position 2.
trans-unit.target: 最后，<xref:System.Array.FindIndex%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Predicate%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法重载用于搜索的位置 2 处开始的三个元素的范围。

trans-unit.source: It returns –1 because there are no dinosaur names in that range that end with "saurus".
trans-unit.target: 它返回 – 1，因为没有在该范围内不复存在名以"saurus"结尾。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 或
