trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements from `startIndex` to the end of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是中的元素数`startIndex`到末尾`array`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates all three generic overloads of the <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示的所有三个泛型重载<xref:System.Array.IndexOf%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of strings is created, with one entry that appears twice, at index location 0 and index location 5.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个字符串数组，其中有一项显示两次，在索引位置 0 和索引位置 5。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%29> method overload searches the array from the beginning, and finds the first occurrence of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%29>方法重载从开始，数组中搜索并查找字符串的第一个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%29> method overload is used to search the array beginning with index location 3 and continuing to the end of the array, and finds the second occurrence of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法重载可用于搜索索引位置 3 开头的数组，直至到数组末尾之间的并查找字符串的第二个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method overload is used to search a range of two entries, beginning at index location two; it returns –1 because there are no instances of the search string in that range.
trans-unit.target: 最后，<xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法重载用于搜索的索引位置两处开头的两个条目范围; 它将返回 – 1，因为没有在该范围内的搜索字符串的实例。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 超出了 <paramref name="array" /> 的有效索引范围。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 数组元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based array to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的从零开始的一维数组。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in <c>array</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <c>array</c> 中查找的对象。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based starting index of the search.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的搜索的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: 0 (zero) is valid in an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 空数组中 0（零）为有效值。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the section to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的部分中的元素数。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified object in a range of elements of a one-dimensional array, and returns the index of its first occurrence.
trans-unit.target: 在一个一维数组的一系列元素中搜索指定对象，然后返回其首个匹配项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The range extends from a specified index for a specified number of elements.
trans-unit.target: 该元素系列的范围从指定数量的元素的指定索引开始。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of <paramref name="value" /> within the range of elements in <paramref name="array" /> that starts at <paramref name="startIndex" /> and contains the number of elements specified in <paramref name="count" />, if found; otherwise, –1.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <paramref name="value" /> 中从 <paramref name="array" /> 开始、包含 <paramref name="startIndex" /> 所指定的元素个数的这部分元素中，找到 <paramref name="count" /> 的匹配项，则为第一个匹配项的从零开始的索引；否则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: This method searchesthe elements of a one-dimensional array from `startIndex` to `startIndex` plus `count` minus 1, if `count` is greater than 0.
trans-unit.target: 此方法 searchesthe 元素从一维数组的`startIndex`到`startIndex`加上`count`减 1，如果`count`大于 0。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether `value` exists in `array`, the method performs an equality comparison by calling the `T.Equals` method on every element.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否`value`中存在`array`，该方法通过调用执行的相等比较`T.Equals`对每个元素的方法。

trans-unit.source: This means that if `T` overrides the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> method, that override is called.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，如果`T`重写<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>方法，重写方法调用。

trans-unit.source: If `startIndex` equals <xref:System.Array.Length%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the method returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果`startIndex`等于<xref:System.Array.Length%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，该方法返回-1。

trans-unit.source: If `startIndex` is greater than <xref:System.Array.Length%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the method throws an <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`startIndex`大于<xref:System.Array.Length%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，该方法将引发<xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `count`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`count`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates all three generic overloads of the <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示的所有三个泛型重载<xref:System.Array.IndexOf%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of strings is created, with one entry that appears twice, at index location 0 and index location 5.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个字符串数组，其中有一项显示两次，在索引位置 0 和索引位置 5。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%29> method overload searches the array from the beginning, and finds the first occurrence of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%29>方法重载从开始，数组中搜索并查找字符串的第一个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%29> method overload is used to search the array beginning with index location 3 and continuing to the end of the array, and finds the second occurrence of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法重载可用于搜索索引位置 3 开头的数组，直至到数组末尾之间的并查找字符串的第二个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method overload is used to search a range of two entries, beginning at index location two; it returns –1 because there are no instances of the search string in that range.
trans-unit.target: 最后，<xref:System.Array.IndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法重载用于搜索的索引位置两处开头的两个条目范围; 它将返回 – 1，因为没有在该范围内的搜索字符串的实例。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 超出了 <paramref name="array" /> 的有效索引范围。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="count" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> and <paramref name="count" /> do not specify a valid section in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 未在 <paramref name="array" /> 中指定有效部分。

trans-unit.source: Initializes every element of the value-type <see cref="T:System.Array" /> by calling the default constructor of the value type.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用值类型的默认构造函数，初始化值类型 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的每一个元素。

trans-unit.source: This method is designed to help compilers support value-type arrays; most users do not need this method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法旨在帮助编译器支持值类型数组;大多数用户不需要使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: It must not be used on reference-type arrays.
trans-unit.target: 它必须不使用引用类型数组中。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Array> is not a value-type <xref:System.Array> or if the value type does not have a default constructor, the <xref:System.Array> is not modified.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Array>不是值类型<xref:System.Array>或值类型不具有默认构造函数，如果<xref:System.Array>则不会修改。

trans-unit.source: The value-type <xref:System.Array> can have any lower bound and any number of dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 值类型<xref:System.Array>可以具有任何下限和任意数量的维度。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Array.Length%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method only on value types that have constructors; however, value types that are native to C# do not have constructors.
trans-unit.target: 你可以仅在具有构造函数; 的值类型上使用此方法但是，值类型都向 C# 本机没有构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 是否具有固定大小。

trans-unit.source: This property is always <see langword="true" /> for all arrays.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对于所有数组总是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Array> implements the <xref:System.Array.IsFixedSize%2A> property because it is required by the <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array> 实现<xref:System.Array.IsFixedSize%2A>属性因为它必需的<xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=nameWithType>接口。

trans-unit.source: An array with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the array is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements.
trans-unit.target: 具有固定大小的数组不允许添加或移除元素，该数组在创建之后，且它允许修改现有元素。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 是否为只读。

trans-unit.source: This property is always <see langword="false" /> for all arrays.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对于所有数组总是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Array> implements the <xref:System.Array.IsReadOnly%2A> property because it is required by the <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array> 实现<xref:System.Array.IsReadOnly%2A>属性因为它必需的<xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=nameWithType>接口。

trans-unit.source: An array that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the array is created.
trans-unit.target: 数组类型的值是只读的不允许添加、 移除或修改元素，创建数组后。

trans-unit.source: If you require a read-only collection, use a <xref:System.Collections> class that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要只读集合，使用<xref:System.Collections>类，该类实现<xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=nameWithType>接口。

trans-unit.source: If you cast or convert an array to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface object, the <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果强制转换或转换到的数组<xref:System.Collections.IList>接口对象<xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: However, if you cast or convert an array to a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> interface, the `IsReadOnly` property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果强制转换或转换到的数组<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>接口，`IsReadOnly`属性返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步对 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的访问（线程安全）。

trans-unit.source: This property is always <see langword="false" /> for all arrays.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对于所有数组总是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Array> implements the <xref:System.Array.IsSynchronized%2A> property because it is required by the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array> 实现<xref:System.Array.IsSynchronized%2A>属性因为它必需的<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>接口。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework classes based on <xref:System.Array> provide their own synchronized version of the collection using the <xref:System.Array.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 类基于<xref:System.Array>提供其自己的同步的版本的集合使用<xref:System.Array.SyncRoot%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Classes that use arrays can also implement their own synchronization using the <xref:System.Array.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用数组的类还可以实现自己的同步使用<xref:System.Array.SyncRoot%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The synchronizing code must perform operations on the `SyncRoot` of the collection, not directly on the collection.
trans-unit.target: 同步代码必须在执行操作`SyncRoot`不是直接对集合的集合。

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the collection.
trans-unit.target: 具体地说，这样可保持正确的同步，与可能同时修改集合的其他线程。

trans-unit.source: Note that some implementations of <xref:System.Array.SyncRoot%2A> might return the <xref:System.Array> itself.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，某些实现的<xref:System.Array.SyncRoot%2A>可能会返回<xref:System.Array>本身。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举整个集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to lock an array during the entire enumeration by using the <xref:System.Array.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何通过使用在整个枚举过程中锁定数组<xref:System.Array.SyncRoot%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the last occurrence of a value in a one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> or in a portion of the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 或部分 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中某个值的最后一个匹配项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in <c>array</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <c>array</c> 中查找的对象。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified object and returns the index of the last occurrence within the entire one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 搜索指定的对象，并返回整个一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中最后一个匹配项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the last occurrence of <paramref name="value" /> within the entire <paramref name="array" />, if found; otherwise, the lower bound of the array minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果在整个 <paramref name="value" /> 中找到 <paramref name="array" /> 的匹配项，则为最后一个匹配项的索引；否则为该数组的下限减 1。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> is searched backward starting at the last element and ending at the first element.
trans-unit.target: 一维<xref:System.Array>向后搜索的最后一个元素开始，在第一个元素结束。

trans-unit.source: The elements are compared to the specified value using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 对元素进行比较到指定的值使用<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the element type is a nonintrinsic (user-defined) type, the `Equals` implementation of that type is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素类型是内部的 （用户定义的） 类型，`Equals`使用该类型的实现。

trans-unit.source: Since most arrays will have a lower bound of zero, this method would generally return –1 when `value` is not found.
trans-unit.target: 由于大多数数组将具有下限为零，因此此方法通常将返回 – 1 在`value`找不到。

trans-unit.source: In the rare case that the lower bound of the array is equal to <xref:System.Int32.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> and `value` is not found, this method returns <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which is `System.Int32.MinValue - 1`.
trans-unit.target: 数组的下限是等于的罕见情况<xref:System.Int32.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>和`value`未找到，则此方法返回<xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>，即`System.Int32.MinValue - 1`。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 2.0, this method uses the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> and <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Array> to determine whether the <xref:System.Object> specified by the `value` parameter exists.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，此方法使用<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>和<xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A>方法<xref:System.Array>以确定是否<xref:System.Object>指定的`value`参数存在。

trans-unit.source: In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> and <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> methods of the `value`<xref:System.Object> itself.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 的早期版本，通过进行此决定<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>和<xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A>方法`value`<xref:System.Object>本身。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> 方法的`item`参数的集合中的对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to determine the index of the last occurrence of a specified element in an array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何确定数组中指定的元素的最后一个匹配项的索引。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多维的。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in <c>array</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <c>array</c> 中查找的对象。

trans-unit.source: The starting index of the backward search.
trans-unit.target: 向后搜索的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified object and returns the index of the last occurrence within the range of elements in the one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that extends from the first element to the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 搜索指定的对象，并返回一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中从第一个元素到指定索引这部分元素中最后一个匹配项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the last occurrence of <paramref name="value" /> within the range of elements in <paramref name="array" /> that extends from the first element to <paramref name="startIndex" />, if found; otherwise, the lower bound of the array minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <paramref name="value" /> 中从第一个元素到 <paramref name="array" /> 这部分元素中找到 <paramref name="startIndex" /> 的匹配项，则为最后一个匹配项的索引；否则为该数组的下限减 1。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> is searched backward starting at `startIndex` and ending at the first element.
trans-unit.target: 一维<xref:System.Array>是搜索向后开始`startIndex`和结束的第一个元素。

trans-unit.source: The elements are compared to the specified value using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 对元素进行比较到指定的值使用<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the element type is a nonintrinsic (user-defined) type, the `Equals` implementation of that type is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素类型是内部的 （用户定义的） 类型，`Equals`使用该类型的实现。

trans-unit.source: Since most arrays will have a lower bound of zero, this method would generally return –1 when `value` is not found.
trans-unit.target: 由于大多数数组将具有下限为零，因此此方法通常将返回 – 1 在`value`找不到。

trans-unit.source: In the rare case that the lower bound of the array is equal to <xref:System.Int32.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> and `value` is not found, this method returns <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which is `System.Int32.MinValue - 1`.
trans-unit.target: 数组的下限是等于的罕见情况<xref:System.Int32.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>和`value`未找到，则此方法返回<xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>，即`System.Int32.MinValue - 1`。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements from the beginning of `array` to `startIndex`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是从开始处的元素数目`array`到`startIndex`。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 2.0, this method uses the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> and <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Array> to determine whether the <xref:System.Object> specified by the `value` parameter exists.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，此方法使用<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>和<xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A>方法<xref:System.Array>以确定是否<xref:System.Object>指定的`value`参数存在。

trans-unit.source: In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> and <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> methods of the `value`<xref:System.Object> itself.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 的早期版本，通过进行此决定<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>和<xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A>方法`value`<xref:System.Object>本身。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to determine the index of the last occurrence of a specified element in an array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何确定数组中指定的元素的最后一个匹配项的索引。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 超出了 <paramref name="array" /> 的有效索引范围。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多维的。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in <c>array</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <c>array</c> 中查找的对象。

trans-unit.source: The starting index of the backward search.
trans-unit.target: 向后搜索的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the section to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的部分中的元素数。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified object and returns the index of the last occurrence within the range of elements in the one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the specified number of elements and ends at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 搜索指定的对象，并返回一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中到指定索引为止包含指定个元素的这部分元素中最后一个匹配项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the last occurrence of <paramref name="value" /> within the range of elements in <paramref name="array" /> that contains the number of elements specified in <paramref name="count" /> and ends at <paramref name="startIndex" />, if found; otherwise, the lower bound of the array minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <paramref name="value" /> 中到 <paramref name="array" /> 为止并且包含的元素个数为在 <paramref name="count" /> 中指定的个数的这部分元素中找到 <paramref name="startIndex" /> 的匹配项，则为最后一个匹配项的索引；否则为该数组的下限减 1。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> is searched backward starting at `startIndex` and ending at `startIndex` minus `count` plus 1, if `count` is greater than 0.
trans-unit.target: 一维<xref:System.Array>是搜索向后开始`startIndex`结束`startIndex`减`count`加上 1，如果`count`大于 0。

trans-unit.source: The elements are compared to the specified value using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 对元素进行比较到指定的值使用<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the element type is a nonintrinsic (user-defined) type, the`Equals` implementation of that type is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素类型是内部的 （用户定义的） 类型，`Equals`使用该类型的实现。

trans-unit.source: Since most arrays will have a lower bound of zero, this method would generally return –1 when `value` is not found.
trans-unit.target: 由于大多数数组将具有下限为零，因此此方法通常将返回 – 1 在`value`找不到。

trans-unit.source: In the rare case that the lower bound of the array is equal to <xref:System.Int32.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> and `value` is not found, this method returns <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which is `System.Int32.MinValue - 1`.
trans-unit.target: 数组的下限是等于的罕见情况<xref:System.Int32.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>和`value`未找到，则此方法返回<xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>，即`System.Int32.MinValue - 1`。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `count`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`count`。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 2.0, this method uses the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> and <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Array> to determine whether the <xref:System.Object> specified by the `value` parameter exists.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，此方法使用<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>和<xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A>方法<xref:System.Array>以确定是否<xref:System.Object>指定的`value`参数存在。

trans-unit.source: In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> and <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> methods of the `value`<xref:System.Object> itself.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 的早期版本，通过进行此决定<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>和<xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A>方法`value`<xref:System.Object>本身。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to determine the index of the last occurrence of a specified element in an array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何确定数组中指定的元素的最后一个匹配项的索引。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%2A> method is a backward search; therefore, `count` must be less than or equal to (`startIndex` minus the lower bound of the array plus 1).
trans-unit.target: 请注意，<xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%2A>方法是向后搜索; 因此，`count`必须小于或等于 (`startIndex`减零下限的数组加 1)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 超出了 <paramref name="array" /> 的有效索引范围。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="count" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> and <paramref name="count" /> do not specify a valid section in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 未在 <paramref name="array" /> 中指定有效部分。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多维的。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 数组元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的从零开始的一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in <c>array</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <c>array</c> 中查找的对象。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified object and returns the index of the last occurrence within the entire <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 搜索指定的对象，并返回整个 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中最后一个匹配项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the last occurrence of <paramref name="value" /> within the entire <paramref name="array" />, if found; otherwise, –1.
trans-unit.target: 如果在整个 <paramref name="value" /> 中找到 <paramref name="array" /> 的匹配项，则为最后一个匹配项的从零开始的索引；否则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> is searched backward starting at the last element and ending at the first element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>向后搜索的最后一个元素开始，在第一个元素结束。

trans-unit.source: The elements are compared to the specified value using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 对元素进行比较到指定的值使用<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the element type is a nonintrinsic (user-defined) type, the `Equals` implementation of that type is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素类型是内部的 （用户定义的） 类型，`Equals`使用该类型的实现。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates all three generic overloads of the <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的所有三个泛型重载<xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of strings is created, with one entry that appears twice, at index location 0 and index location 5.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个字符串数组，其中有一项显示两次，在索引位置 0 和索引位置 5。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%29> method overload searches the entire array from the end, and finds the second occurrence of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%29>方法重载从结束时，整个数组中搜索并查找字符串的第二个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%29> method overload is used to search the array backward beginning with index location 3 and continuing to the beginning of the array, and finds the first occurrence of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法重载可用于搜索数组向后开头的索引位置 3，直至到该数组的开头，并查找字符串的第一个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method overload is used to search a range of four entries, beginning at index location 4 and extending backward (that is, it searches the items at locations 4, 3, 2, and 1); this search returns –1 because there are no instances of the search string in that range.
trans-unit.target: 最后，<xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法重载用于搜索的索引位置 4 处开始并扩展向后的四个条目范围 （即，搜索位置 4、 3、 2 和 1 处的项）; 此搜索返回 – 1，因为没有的搜索的实例在该范围内的字符串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 数组元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的从零开始的一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in <c>array</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <c>array</c> 中查找的对象。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based starting index of the backward search.
trans-unit.target: 向后搜索的从零开始的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified object and returns the index of the last occurrence within the range of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that extends from the first element to the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 搜索指定的对象，并返回 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中从第一个元素到指定索引这部分元素中最后一个匹配项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the last occurrence of <paramref name="value" /> within the range of elements in <paramref name="array" /> that extends from the first element to <paramref name="startIndex" />, if found; otherwise, –1.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <paramref name="value" /> 中从第一个元素到 <paramref name="array" /> 这部分元素中找到 <paramref name="startIndex" /> 的匹配项，则为最后一个匹配项的从零开始的索引；否则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> is searched backward starting at `startIndex` and ending at the first element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>是搜索向后开始`startIndex`和结束的第一个元素。

trans-unit.source: The elements are compared to the specified value using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 对元素进行比较到指定的值使用<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the element type is a nonintrinsic (user-defined) type, the `Equals` implementation of that type is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素类型是内部的 （用户定义的） 类型，`Equals`使用该类型的实现。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements from the beginning of `array` to `startIndex`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是从开始处的元素数目`array`到`startIndex`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates all three generic overloads of the <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的所有三个泛型重载<xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of strings is created, with one entry that appears twice, at index location 0 and index location 5.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个字符串数组，其中有一项显示两次，在索引位置 0 和索引位置 5。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%29> method overload searches the entire array from the end, and finds the second occurrence of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%29>方法重载从结束时，整个数组中搜索并查找字符串的第二个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%29> method overload is used to search the array backward beginning with index location 3 and continuing to the beginning of the array, and finds the first occurrence of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法重载可用于搜索数组向后开头的索引位置 3，直至到该数组的开头，并查找字符串的第一个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method overload is used to search a range of four entries, beginning at index location 4 and extending backward (that is, it searches the items at locations 4, 3, 2, and 1); this search returns –1 because there are no instances of the search string in that range.
trans-unit.target: 最后，<xref:System.Array.LastIndexOf%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法重载用于搜索的索引位置 4 处开始并扩展向后的四个条目范围 （即，搜索位置 4、 3、 2 和 1 处的项）; 此搜索返回 – 1，因为没有的搜索的实例在该范围内的字符串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="count" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> and <paramref name="count" /> do not specify a valid section in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 未在 <paramref name="array" /> 中指定有效部分。

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of elements in all the dimensions of the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的所有维度中的元素总数。

trans-unit.source: The total number of elements in all the dimensions of the <see cref="T:System.Array" />; zero if there are no elements in the array.
trans-unit.target: 所有维数中元素的总数<see cref="T:System.Array" />; 零如果数组中没有的元素。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> property to get the total number of elements in an array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>属性来获取数组中的元素总数。

trans-unit.source: It also uses the <xref:System.Array.GetUpperBound%2A> method to determine the number of elements in each dimension of a multidimensional array.
trans-unit.target: 它还使用<xref:System.Array.GetUpperBound%2A>方法来确定每个维度的多维数组中的元素数。

trans-unit.source: The array is multidimensional and contains more than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> elements.
trans-unit.target: 数组是多维的，并且包括多于 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> 个元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets a 64-bit integer that represents the total number of elements in all the dimensions of the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 64 位整数，该整数表示 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的所有维数中元素的总数。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit integer that represents the total number of elements in all the dimensions of the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 64 位整数，表示 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的所有维数中元素的总数。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the rank (number of dimensions) of the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的秩（维数）。

trans-unit.source: For example, a one-dimensional array returns 1, a two-dimensional array returns 2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 例如，一维数组返回 1，二维数组返回 2，依次类推。

trans-unit.source: The rank (number of dimensions) of the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 该 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的秩（维数）。

trans-unit.source: For example, the Visual Basic code
trans-unit.target: 例如，Visual Basic 代码

trans-unit.source: and the C# code
trans-unit.target: 和 C# 代码

trans-unit.source: create an array of three dimensions with a <xref:System.Array.Rank%2A> property whose value is 3.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个具有三个维度的数组<xref:System.Array.Rank%2A>其值为 3 的属性。

trans-unit.source: A jagged array (an array of arrays) is a one-dimensional array; the value of its <xref:System.Array.Rank%2A> property is 1.
trans-unit.target: 交错的数组 （由数组的数组） 是一维数组中;值其<xref:System.Array.Rank%2A>属性为 1。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。

trans-unit.source: The following example initializes a one-dimensional array, a two-dimensional array, and a jagged array, and retrieves the <xref:System.Array.Rank%2A> property of each.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将初始化一个一维数组、 一个二维数组和交错的数组，并检索<xref:System.Array.Rank%2A>每个属性。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 数组元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based array to resize, or <see langword="null" /> to create a new array with the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 要调整大小的一维数组，该数组从零开始；如果为 <see langword="null" />，则新建具有指定大小的数组。

trans-unit.source: The size of the new array.
trans-unit.target: 新数组的大小。

trans-unit.source: Changes the number of elements of a one-dimensional array to the specified new size.
trans-unit.target: 将一维数组的元素数更改为指定的新大小。

trans-unit.source: This method allocates a new array with the specified size, copies elements from the old array to the new one, and then replaces the old array with the new one.
trans-unit.target: 此方法分配指定大小的新数组，将元素从旧的数组复制到新，然后使用新替换旧的数组。

trans-unit.source: `array` must be a one-dimensional array.
trans-unit.target: `array` 必须是一个一维数组。

trans-unit.source: If `array` is `null`, this method creates a new array with the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 如果`array`是`null`，此方法具有指定大小创建一个新数组。

trans-unit.source: If `newSize` is greater than the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of the old array, a new array is allocated and all the elements are copied from the old array to the new one.
trans-unit.target: 如果`newSize`大于<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的旧的数组中，分配一个新数组，且所有元素从旧的数组都复制到新。

trans-unit.source: If `newSize` is less than the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of the old array, a new array is allocated and elements are copied from the old array to the new one until the new one is filled; the rest of the elements in the old array are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果`newSize`是小于<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的旧的数组中，分配一个新数组和元素从旧数组复制到新直到填充新的; 旧的数组中的元素的其余部分将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If `newSize` is equal to the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of the old array, this method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 如果`newSize`等同于<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的旧的数组，此方法不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `newSize`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`newSize`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.Resize%2A> method resizes a one-dimensional array only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.Resize%2A>方法调整大小的一维数组。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> class does not include a method for resizing multi-dimensional arrays.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>类不包括用于调整大小多维数组的方法。

trans-unit.source: To do this, you must either provide your own code or call a special-purpose method in a third-party library.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行此操作，你必须提供您自己的代码或调用的第三方库中的特殊用途方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code illustrates one possible implementation for a method that resizes an array of *n* dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示调整大小的数组的方法的一种可能实现*n*维度。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how resizing affects the array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何调整大小影响数组。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="newSize" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="newSize" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: Reverses the order of the elements in a one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> or in a portion of the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 反转一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 或部分 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中元素的顺序。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to reverse.
trans-unit.target: 要反转的一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: Reverses the sequence of the elements in the entire one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 反转整个一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中元素的顺序。

trans-unit.source: After a call to this method, the element at `myArray[i]`, where `i` is any index in the array, moves to `myArray[j]`, where `j` equals `(myArray.Length + myArray.GetLowerBound(0)) - (i - myArray.GetLowerBound(0)) - 1`.
trans-unit.target: 在这种方法，处的元素调用`myArray[i]`，其中`i`是数组中的任何索引，将移动到`myArray[j]`，其中`j`等于`(myArray.Length + myArray.GetLowerBound(0)) - (i - myArray.GetLowerBound(0)) - 1`。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: As the following example shows, the <xref:System.Array.Reverse%2A> method can be used to reverse a jagged array.
trans-unit.target: 如下面的示例所示，<xref:System.Array.Reverse%2A>方法可以用于反向交错的数组。

trans-unit.source: It initializes a jagged array with one element for each month of the current year in the current culture's calendar.
trans-unit.target: 它将初始化为当前区域性的日历中的当前年份的每个月交错的数组包含一个元素。

trans-unit.source: Each element contains an array with as many elements as that month has days.
trans-unit.target: 每个元素包含与该月有天数的所有元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: The example displays the contents of the array, calls the <xref:System.Array.Reverse%2A> method, and then displays the contents of the reversed array.
trans-unit.target: 该示例显示数组，调用的内容<xref:System.Array.Reverse%2A>方法，然后显示反向数组的内容。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to reverse the sort of the values in an <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何反向中的值排序<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多维的。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to reverse.
trans-unit.target: 要反转的一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The starting index of the section to reverse.
trans-unit.target: 要反转的部分的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the section to reverse.
trans-unit.target: 要反转的部分中的元素数。

trans-unit.source: Reverses the sequence of the elements in a range of elements in the one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 反转一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中某部分元素的元素顺序。

trans-unit.source: After a call to this method, the element at `myArray[i]`, where `i` is any index in the array, moves to `myArray[j]`, where `j` equals `(myArray.Length + myArray.GetLowerBound(0)) - (i - myArray.GetLowerBound(0)) - 1`.
trans-unit.target: 在这种方法，处的元素调用`myArray[i]`，其中`i`是数组中的任何索引，将移动到`myArray[j]`，其中`j`等于`(myArray.Length + myArray.GetLowerBound(0)) - (i - myArray.GetLowerBound(0)) - 1`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.Reverse%2A> method can be used to reverse a jagged array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.Reverse%2A>方法可以用于反向交错的数组。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to reverse the sort of the values in a range of elements in an <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何反向中的元素范围中的值的排序<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多维的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than the lower bound of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小于 <paramref name="array" /> 的下限。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> and <paramref name="length" /> do not specify a valid range in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 和 <paramref name="length" /> 未在 <paramref name="array" /> 中指定有效范围。

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified element in the current <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 将当前 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的指定元素设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The new value for the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 指定元素的新值。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that represents the position of the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> element to set.
trans-unit.target: 一个 32 位整数，它表示要设置的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 元素的位置。

trans-unit.source: Sets a value to the element at the specified position in the one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 将某值设置给一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中指定位置的元素。

trans-unit.source: The index is specified as a 32-bit integer.
trans-unit.target: 索引指定为 32 位整数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.GetLowerBound%2A> and <xref:System.Array.GetUpperBound%2A> methods can determine whether the value of `index` is out of bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.GetLowerBound%2A>和<xref:System.Array.GetUpperBound%2A>方法可以确定是否的值`index`超出界限。

trans-unit.source: For more information about conversions, see <xref:System.Convert>.
trans-unit.target: 有关转换的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Convert>。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 o （1） 运算。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Array.SetValue%2A> is used to assign `null` to an element of an array of value types, all fields of the element are initialized to zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Array.SetValue%2A>用于分配`null`到值类型数组的元素，该元素的所有字段都初始化为零。

trans-unit.source: The value of the element is not a null reference, and cannot be found by searching for a null reference.
trans-unit.target: 元素的值不是 null 引用，并无法找到所搜索的 null 引用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set and get a specific value in a one-dimensional or multidimensional array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置和获取一维或多维数组中的特定值。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Array" /> does not have exactly one dimension.
trans-unit.target: 当前的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 不是正好有一维。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> cannot be cast to the element type of the current <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不能强制转换为当前 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的元素类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for the current <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 超出当前 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的有效索引的范围。

trans-unit.source: The new value for the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 指定元素的新值。

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional array of 32-bit integers that represent the indexes specifying the position of the element to set.
trans-unit.target: 32 位整数的一维数组，它表示用于指定要设置的元素的位置的索引。

trans-unit.source: Sets a value to the element at the specified position in the multidimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 将某值设置给多维 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中指定位置的元素。

trans-unit.source: The indexes are specified as an array of 32-bit integers.
trans-unit.target: 索引指定为一个 32 位整数数组。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in `indices` must equal the number of dimensions in the <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 中的元素数`indices`必须等于的中的维数<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: All elements in the `indices` array must collectively specify the position of the desired element in the multidimensional <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有元素`indices`数组必须共同指定所需元素的位置，在多维<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.GetLowerBound%2A> and <xref:System.Array.GetUpperBound%2A> methods can determine whether any of the values in the `indices` array is out of bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.GetLowerBound%2A>和<xref:System.Array.GetUpperBound%2A>方法可以确定是否有任何中的值`indices`数组是超出界限。

trans-unit.source: For more information about conversions, see <xref:System.Convert>.
trans-unit.target: 有关转换的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Convert>。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 o （1） 运算。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Array.SetValue%2A> is used to assign `null` to an element of an array of value types, all fields of the element are initialized to zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Array.SetValue%2A>用于分配`null`到值类型数组的元素，该元素的所有字段都初始化为零。

trans-unit.source: The value of the element is not a null reference, and cannot be found by searching for a null reference.
trans-unit.target: 元素的值不是 null 引用，并无法找到所搜索的 null 引用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set and get a specific value in a one-dimensional or multidimensional array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置和获取一维或多维数组中的特定值。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Array" /> does not have exactly three dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 当前的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 不是正好有三维。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> cannot be cast to the element type of the current <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不能强制转换为当前 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的元素类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index1" /> or <paramref name="index2" /> or <paramref name="index3" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for the corresponding dimension of the current <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index1" /> 或 <paramref name="index2" /> 或 <paramref name="index3" /> 超出当前 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的对应维度的有效索引的范围。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the elements in a one-dimensional array.
trans-unit.target: 对一维数组中的元素进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to sort.
trans-unit.target: 要排序的一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the elements in an entire one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> using the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> implementation of each element of the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中每个元素的 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 实现，对整个一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的元素进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Each element of `array` must implement the <xref:System.IComparable> interface to be capable of comparisons with every other element in `array`.
trans-unit.target: 每个元素`array`必须实现<xref:System.IComparable>接口，才能与中的每个其他元素的比较`array`。

trans-unit.source: If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果未成功完成排序，结果不确定。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows:
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用反省排序 (introsort) 算法，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 分区大小是否少于 16 个元素，它使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)算法。

trans-unit.source: If the number of partitions exceeds 2 * Log<sup>N</sup>, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果分区数超过 2 * 日志<sup>N</sup>，其中*N*是范围的输入数组，它使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)算法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它使用[快速排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)算法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将执行不稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素相等，则可能不会保留其顺序。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等的元素的顺序。

trans-unit.source: For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 对于在最坏情况下使用 Heapsort 和快速排序算法排过序的数组，此方法为 O (`n`日志`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to sort the values in an <xref:System.Array> using the default comparer and a custom comparer that reverses the sort order.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何进行排序中的值<xref:System.Array>使用默认比较器和将反转排序顺序的自定义比较器。

trans-unit.source: Note that the result might vary depending on the current <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，结果可能有所不同具体取决于当前<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多维的。

trans-unit.source: One or more elements in <paramref name="array" /> do not implement the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 中的一个或多个元素未实现 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 接口。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the keys to sort.
trans-unit.target: 一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，它包含要排序的关键字。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the items that correspond to each of the keys in the <c>keys</c><see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，其中包含与 <c>keys</c><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中每个关键字对应的项。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" /> to sort only the <c>keys</c><see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="null" />，则只对 <c>keys</c><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Sorts a pair of one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> objects (one contains the keys and the other contains the corresponding items) based on the keys in the first <see cref="T:System.Array" /> using the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> implementation of each key.
trans-unit.target: 基于第一个 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的关键字，使用每个关键字的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 实现，对两个一维 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 对象（一个包含关键字，另一个包含对应的项）进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Each key in the `keys`<xref:System.Array> has a corresponding item in the `items`<xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 在每个键`keys`<xref:System.Array>都有对应项`items` <xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: When a key is repositioned during the sorting, the corresponding item in the `items`<xref:System.Array> is similarly repositioned.
trans-unit.target: 在排序中的相应项过程时重新定位密钥`items`<xref:System.Array>同样重新定位。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the `items`<xref:System.Array> is sorted according to the arrangement of the corresponding keys in the `keys`<xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 因此， `items` <xref:System.Array>根据中对应键的排列方式排序`keys` <xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: Each key in the `keys`<xref:System.Array> must implement the <xref:System.IComparable> interface to be capable of comparisons with every other key.
trans-unit.target: 在每个键`keys`<xref:System.Array>必须实现<xref:System.IComparable>接口，才能与每个其他键的比较。

trans-unit.source: You can sort if there are more items than keys, but the items that have no corresponding keys will not be sorted.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多个项与键，但具有没有对应的键的项将不会进行排序，您可以进行排序。

trans-unit.source: You cannot sort if there are more keys than items; doing this throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多个项与项; 您不能进行排序这样做这会引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果未成功完成排序，结果不确定。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows:
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用反省排序 (introsort) 算法，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 分区大小是否少于 16 个元素，它使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)算法。

trans-unit.source: If the number of partitions exceeds 2 * Log<sup>N</sup>, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果分区数超过 2 * 日志<sup>N</sup>，其中*N*是范围的输入数组，它使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)算法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它使用[快速排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)算法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将执行不稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素相等，则可能不会保留其顺序。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等的元素的顺序。

trans-unit.source: For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `keys`.
trans-unit.target: 对于在最坏情况下使用 Heapsort 和快速排序算法排过序的数组，此方法为 O (`n`日志`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`keys`。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to sort two associated arrays where the first array contains the keys and the second array contains the values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何对两个关联的数组的第一个数组包含的键，其中第二个数组包含的值进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Sorts are done using the default comparer and a custom comparer that reverses the sort order.
trans-unit.target: 完成排序使用的默认比较器和将反转排序顺序的自定义比较器。

trans-unit.source: Note that the result might vary depending on the current <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，结果可能有所不同具体取决于当前<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="keys" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keys" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 是多维的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="items" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="items" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 是多维的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="items" /> is not <see langword="null" />, and the length of <paramref name="keys" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="items" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="items" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，并且 <paramref name="keys" /> 的长度大于 <paramref name="items" /> 的长度。

trans-unit.source: One or more elements in the <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> do not implement the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的一个或多个元素未实现 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 接口。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array to sort.
trans-unit.target: 要排序的一维数组。

trans-unit.source: The implementation to use when comparing elements.
trans-unit.target: 比较元素时要使用的实现。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" /> to use the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> implementation of each element.
trans-unit.target: 若为 <see langword="null" />，则使用每个元素的 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 实现。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the elements in a one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，对一维 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> 中的元素进行排序。

trans-unit.source: If `comparer` is `null`, each element of `array` must implement the <xref:System.IComparable> interface to be capable of comparisons with every other element in `array`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparer`是`null`的每个元素`array`必须实现<xref:System.IComparable>接口，才能与中的每个其他元素的比较`array`。

trans-unit.source: If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果未成功完成排序，结果不确定。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows:
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用反省排序 (introsort) 算法，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 分区大小是否少于 16 个元素，它使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)算法。

trans-unit.source: If the number of partitions exceeds 2 * Log<sup>N</sup>, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果分区数超过 2 * 日志<sup>N</sup>，其中*N*是范围的输入数组，它使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)算法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它使用[快速排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)算法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将执行不稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素相等，则可能不会保留其顺序。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等的元素的顺序。

trans-unit.source: For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 对于在最坏情况下使用 Heapsort 和快速排序算法排过序的数组，此方法为 O (`n`日志`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework includes predefined <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> implementations listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 包括预定义<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>下表中列出的实现。

trans-unit.source: Implementation
trans-unit.target: 实现

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Compares any two objects, but performs a case-insensitive comparison of strings.
trans-unit.target: 比较任意两个对象，但执行不区分大小写的字符串比较。

trans-unit.source: Compares any two objects by using the sorting conventions of the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 使用当前区域性的排序约定比较任意两个对象。

trans-unit.source: Compares any two objects by using the sorting conventions of the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: 使用固定区域性的排序约定比较任意两个对象。

trans-unit.source: Compares two objects of type `T` by using the type's default sort order.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个对象类型的`T`通过使用该类型的默认排序顺序。

trans-unit.source: You can also support custom comparisons by providing an instance of your own <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> implementation to the `comparer` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以通过提供你自己的实例来支持自定义比较<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>实现`comparer`参数。

trans-unit.source: The example does this by defining a `ReverseComparer` class that reverses the default sort order for instances of a type and performs case-insensitive string comparison.
trans-unit.target: 该示例执行这通过定义`ReverseComparer`反转的默认排序顺序的类类型的实例和执行不区分大小写的字符串比较。

trans-unit.source: The following example sorts the values in a string arrayby using the default comparer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例对使用默认比较器字符串 arrayby 中的值进行排序。

trans-unit.source: It also defines a custom <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> implementation named `ReverseComparer` that reverses an object's default sort order while performing a case-insensitive string comparison.
trans-unit.target: 它还定义一个自定义<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>实现名为`ReverseComparer`，反转同时执行不区分大小写的字符串比较的对象的默认排序顺序。

trans-unit.source: Note that the output might vary depending on the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，输出根据当前区域性可能有所不同。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多维的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="comparer" /> is <see langword="null" />, and one or more elements in <paramref name="array" /> do not implement the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />，<paramref name="array" /> 中的一个或多个元素不实现 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 接口。

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <paramref name="comparer" /> caused an error during the sort.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparer" /> 的实现导致排序时出现错误。

trans-unit.source: For example, <paramref name="comparer" /> might not return 0 when comparing an item with itself.
trans-unit.target: 例如，将某个项与其自身比较时，<paramref name="comparer" /> 可能不返回 0。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions used only the Quicksort algorithm.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 4 和更早版本使用仅快速排序算法。

trans-unit.source: Quicksort identifies invalid comparers in some situations in which the sorting operation throws an <see cref="T:System.IndexOutOfRangeException" /> exception, and throws an <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" /> exception to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 快速排序标识无效的比较器，在某些情况下，排序操作会引发<see cref="T:System.IndexOutOfRangeException" />异常，并且将引发<see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" />异常向调用方。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], it is possible that sorting operations that previously threw <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" /> will not throw an exception, because the insertion sort and heapsort algorithms do not detect an invalid comparer.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，则可能引发以前排序操作，<see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" />将不会引发异常，因为插入排序和 heapsort 算法不检测到无效的比较器。

trans-unit.source: For the most part, this applies to arrays with fewer than 16 elements.
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这适用于具有少于 16 个元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the keys to sort.
trans-unit.target: 一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，它包含要排序的关键字。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the items that correspond to each of the keys in the <c>keys</c><see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，其中包含与 <c>keys</c><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中每个关键字对应的项。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" /> to sort only the <c>keys</c><see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="null" />，则只对 <c>keys</c><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> implementation to use when comparing elements.
trans-unit.target: 比较元素时要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> 实现。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" /> to use the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> implementation of each element.
trans-unit.target: 若为 <see langword="null" />，则使用每个元素的 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 实现。

trans-unit.source: Sorts a pair of one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> objects (one contains the keys and the other contains the corresponding items) based on the keys in the first <see cref="T:System.Array" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" />.
trans-unit.target: 基于第一个 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的关键字，使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，对两个一维 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> 对象（一个包含关键字，另一个包含对应的项）进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Each key in the `keys`<xref:System.Array> has a corresponding item in the `items`<xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 在每个键`keys`<xref:System.Array>都有对应项`items` <xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: When a key is repositioned during the sorting, the corresponding item in the `items`<xref:System.Array> is similarly repositioned.
trans-unit.target: 在排序中的相应项过程时重新定位密钥`items`<xref:System.Array>同样重新定位。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the `items`<xref:System.Array> is sorted according to the arrangement of the corresponding keys in the `keys`<xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 因此， `items` <xref:System.Array>根据中对应键的排列方式排序`keys` <xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: If `comparer` is `null`, each key in the `keys`<xref:System.Array> must implement the <xref:System.IComparable> interface to be capable of comparisons with every other key.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparer`是`null`，每个密钥中`keys`<xref:System.Array>必须实现<xref:System.IComparable>接口，才能与每个其他键的比较。

trans-unit.source: You can sort if there are more items than keys, but the items that have no corresponding keys will not be sorted.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多个项与键，但具有没有对应的键的项将不会进行排序，您可以进行排序。

trans-unit.source: You cannot sort if there are more keys than items; doing this throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多个项与项; 您不能进行排序这样做这会引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果未成功完成排序，结果不确定。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to sort.

trans-unit.target: 排序范围的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the range to sort.

trans-unit.source: Sorts the elements in a range of elements in a one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> using the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> implementation of each element of the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中每个元素的 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 实现，对一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中某部分元素进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Each element within the specified range of elements in `array` must implement the <xref:System.IComparable> interface to be capable of comparisons with every other element in `array`.

trans-unit.source: This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows:
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用反省排序 (introsort) 算法，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm.

trans-unit.source: If the number of partitions exceeds 2 * Log<sup>N</sup>, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果分区数超过 2 * 日志<sup>N</sup>，其中*N*是范围的输入数组，它使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)算法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它使用[快速排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)算法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将执行不稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素相等，则可能不会保留其顺序。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等的元素的顺序。

trans-unit.source: For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 对于在最坏情况下使用 Heapsort 和快速排序算法排过序的数组，此方法为 O (`n`日志`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to sort the values in an <xref:System.Array> using the default comparer and a custom comparer that reverses the sort order.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何进行排序中的值<xref:System.Array>使用默认比较器和将反转排序顺序的自定义比较器。

trans-unit.source: Note that the result might vary depending on the current <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，结果可能有所不同具体取决于当前<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多维的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than the lower bound of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小于 <paramref name="array" /> 的下限。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> and <paramref name="length" /> do not specify a valid range in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 和 <paramref name="length" /> 未在 <paramref name="array" /> 中指定有效范围。

trans-unit.source: One or more elements in <paramref name="array" /> do not implement the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 中的一个或多个元素未实现 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 接口。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the keys to sort.
trans-unit.target: 一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，它包含要排序的关键字。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the items that correspond to each of the keys in the <c>keys</c><see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，其中包含与 <c>keys</c><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中每个关键字对应的项。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" /> to sort only the <c>keys</c><see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="null" />，则只对 <c>keys</c><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The starting index of the range to sort.
trans-unit.target: 排序范围的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the range to sort.
trans-unit.target: 排序范围内的元素数。

trans-unit.source: Sorts a range of elements in a pair of one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> objects (one contains the keys and the other contains the corresponding items) based on the keys in the first <see cref="T:System.Array" /> using the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> implementation of each key.
trans-unit.target: 基于第一个 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的关键字，使用每个关键字的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 实现，对两个一维 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 对象（一个包含关键字，另一个包含对应的项）的部分元素进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Each key in the `keys`<xref:System.Array> has a corresponding item in the `items`<xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 在每个键`keys`<xref:System.Array>都有对应项`items` <xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: When a key is repositioned during the sorting, the corresponding item in the `items`<xref:System.Array> is similarly repositioned.
trans-unit.target: 在排序中的相应项过程时重新定位密钥`items`<xref:System.Array>同样重新定位。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the `items`<xref:System.Array> is sorted according to the arrangement of the corresponding keys in the `keys`<xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 因此， `items` <xref:System.Array>根据中对应键的排列方式排序`keys` <xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: Each key within the specified range of elements in the `keys`<xref:System.Array> must implement the <xref:System.IComparable> interface to be capable of comparisons with every other key.
trans-unit.target: 指定范围中的元素内的每个键`keys`<xref:System.Array>必须实现<xref:System.IComparable>接口，才能与每个其他键的比较。

trans-unit.source: You can sort if there are more items than keys, but the items that have no corresponding keys will not be sorted.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多个项与键，但具有没有对应的键的项将不会进行排序，您可以进行排序。

trans-unit.source: You cannot sort if there are more keys than items; doing this throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多个项与项; 您不能进行排序这样做这会引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果未成功完成排序，结果不确定。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows:
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用反省排序 (introsort) 算法，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 分区大小是否少于 16 个元素，它使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)算法。

trans-unit.source: If the number of partitions exceeds 2 * Log<sup>N</sup>, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果分区数超过 2 * 日志<sup>N</sup>，其中*N*是范围的输入数组，它使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)算法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它使用[快速排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)算法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将执行不稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素相等，则可能不会保留其顺序。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等的元素的顺序。

trans-unit.source: For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 对于在最坏情况下使用 Heapsort 和快速排序算法排过序的数组，此方法为 O (`n`日志`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to sort two associated arrays where the first array contains the keys and the second array contains the values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何对两个关联的数组的第一个数组包含的键，其中第二个数组包含的值进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Sorts are done using the default comparer and a custom comparer that reverses the sort order.
trans-unit.target: 完成排序使用的默认比较器和将反转排序顺序的自定义比较器。

trans-unit.source: Note that the result might vary depending on the current <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，结果可能有所不同具体取决于当前<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keys" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。
