trans-unit.target: 此实现将执行不稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素相等，则可能不会保留其顺序。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等的元素的顺序。

trans-unit.source: For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 对于在最坏情况下使用 Heapsort 和快速排序算法排过序的数组，此方法为 O (`n`日志`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> generic method overload and the <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> generic method overload.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>泛型方法重载与<xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>泛型方法重载。

trans-unit.source: The code example defines an alternative comparer for strings, named `ReverseCompare`, which implements the `IComparer<string>` (`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer<String^>` in Visual C++) generic interface.
trans-unit.target: 代码示例定义了将可选的比较器字符串，名为`ReverseCompare`，该类实现`IComparer<string>`(`IComparer(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中， `IComparer<String^>` Visual c + +) 泛型接口。

trans-unit.source: The comparer calls the <xref:System.String.CompareTo%28System.String%29> method, reversing the order of the comparands so that the strings sort high-to-low instead of low-to-high.
trans-unit.target: 比较器调用<xref:System.String.CompareTo%28System.String%29>方法，以便字符串排序高到低而不是低到高数比较字的顺序反转。

trans-unit.source: The array is displayed, sorted, and displayed again.
trans-unit.target: 数组是显示、 排序，并且再次显示。

trans-unit.source: Arrays must be sorted in order to use the <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 数组必须进行排序以便使用<xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The calls to the <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> and <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> generic methods do not look any different from calls to their nongeneric counterparts, because Visual Basic, C#, and C++ infer the type of the generic type parameter from the type of the first argument.
trans-unit.target: 对调用<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>和<xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>泛型方法不查找任何不同于调用其非泛型对应项，因为 Visual Basic、 C# 和 c + + 来推断从第一个参数的类型的泛型类型参数的类型。

trans-unit.source: If you use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), you can see that the generic methods are being called.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)若要检查的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL)，你可以看到泛型方法正被调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> generic method overload is then used to search for two strings, one that is not in the array and one that is.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>泛型方法重载然后用于两个字符串搜索，另一个不在使用数组和一个，是。

trans-unit.source: The array and the return value of the <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> method are passed to the `ShowWhere` generic method, which displays the index value if the string is found, and otherwise the elements the search string would fall between if it were in the array.
trans-unit.target: 数组和返回值的<xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法传递给`ShowWhere`泛型方法，如果找到该字符串，而且否则元素的搜索字符串将介于像它是数组中显示的索引值。

trans-unit.source: The index is negative if the string is not n the array, so the `ShowWhere` method takes the bitwise complement (the ~ operator in C# and Visual C++, `Xor` -1 in Visual Basic) to obtain the index of the first element in the list that is larger than the search string.
trans-unit.target: 索引是如果字符串不是 n 负数组，因此`ShowWhere`方法采用的按位求补 (~ 中 C# 和 Visual c + + 中，运算符`Xor`在 Visual Basic 中的为-1) 若要获取大于搜索 stri 列表中的第一个元素的索引ng。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="comparer" /> is <see langword="null" />, and one or more elements in <paramref name="array" /> do not implement the <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> generic interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />，并且 <paramref name="array" /> 中的一个或多个元素未实现 <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> 泛型接口。

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <paramref name="comparer" /> caused an error during the sort.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparer" /> 的实现导致排序时出现错误。

trans-unit.source: For example, <paramref name="comparer" /> might not return 0 when comparing an item with itself.
trans-unit.target: 例如，将某个项与其自身比较时，<paramref name="comparer" /> 可能不返回 0。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions used only the Quicksort algorithm.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 4 和更早版本使用仅快速排序算法。

trans-unit.source: Quicksort identifies invalid comparers in some situations in which the sorting operation throws an <see cref="T:System.IndexOutOfRangeException" /> exception, and throws an <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" /> exception to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 快速排序标识无效的比较器，在某些情况下，排序操作会引发<see cref="T:System.IndexOutOfRangeException" />异常，并且将引发<see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" />异常向调用方。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], it is possible that sorting operations that previously threw <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" /> will not throw an exception, because the insertion sort and heapsort algorithms do not detect an invalid comparer.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，则可能引发以前排序操作，<see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" />将不会引发异常，因为插入排序和 heapsort 算法不检测到无效的比较器。

trans-unit.source: For the most part, this applies to arrays with fewer than 16 elements.
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这适用于具有少于 16 个元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 数组元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to sort
trans-unit.target: 要排序的从零开始的一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Comparison`1" /> to use when comparing elements.
trans-unit.target: 比较元素时要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Comparison`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the elements in an <see cref="T:System.Array" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Comparison`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 对 <see cref="T:System.Comparison`1" /> 中的元素进行排序。

trans-unit.source: If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果未成功完成排序，结果不确定。

trans-unit.source: This method uses introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows:
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用反省排序 (introsort) 算法，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 分区大小是否少于 16 个元素，它使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)算法。

trans-unit.source: If the number of partitions exceeds 2 * Log<sup>N</sup>, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果分区数超过 2 * 日志<sup>N</sup>，其中*N*是范围的输入数组，它使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)算法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它使用[快速排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)算法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将执行不稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素相等，则可能不会保留其顺序。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等的元素的顺序。

trans-unit.source: For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 对于在最坏情况下使用 Heapsort 和快速排序算法排过序的数组，此方法为 O (`n`日志`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601.Sort%28System.Comparison%7B%600%7D%29> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601.Sort%28System.Comparison%7B%600%7D%29>方法重载。

trans-unit.source: The code example defines an alternative comparison method for strings, named `CompareDinosByLength`.
trans-unit.target: 代码示例定义了命名的字符串替换比较方法`CompareDinosByLength`。

trans-unit.source: This method works as follows: First, the comparandsare tested for`null`, and a null reference is treated as less than a non-null.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的工作方式如下： 首先，comparandsare 测试为`null`，并为空引用被视为小于非空。

trans-unit.source: Second, the string lengths are compared, and the longer string is deemed to be greater.
trans-unit.target: 其次，比较字符串的长度，和较长的字符串被认为更高版本。

trans-unit.source: Third, if the lengths are equal, ordinary string comparison is used.
trans-unit.target: 第三，如果长度相等，则使用普通字符串比较。

trans-unit.source: A array of strings is created and populated with four strings, in no particular order.
trans-unit.target: 创建并填充了四个字符串，顺序不分先后字符串的数组。

trans-unit.source: The list also includes an empty string and a null reference.
trans-unit.target: 列表还包括一个空字符串和 null 引用。

trans-unit.source: The list is displayed, sorted using a <xref:System.Comparison%601> generic delegate representing the `CompareDinosByLength` method, and displayed again.
trans-unit.target: 显示的列表，使用排序<xref:System.Comparison%601>泛型委托表示`CompareDinosByLength`方法，然后再次显示。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="comparison" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparison" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <paramref name="comparison" /> caused an error during the sort.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparison" /> 的实现导致排序时出现错误。

trans-unit.source: For example, <paramref name="comparison" /> might not return 0 when comparing an item with itself.
trans-unit.target: 例如，将某个项与其自身比较时，<paramref name="comparison" /> 可能不返回 0。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions used only the Quicksort algorithm.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 4 和更早版本使用仅快速排序算法。

trans-unit.source: Quicksort identifies invalid comparers in some situations in which the sorting operation throws an <see cref="T:System.IndexOutOfRangeException" /> exception, and throws an <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" /> exception to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 快速排序标识无效的比较器，在某些情况下，排序操作会引发<see cref="T:System.IndexOutOfRangeException" />异常，并且将引发<see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" />异常向调用方。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], it is possible that sorting operations that previously threw <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" /> will not throw an exception, because the insertion sort and heapsort algorithms do not detect an invalid comparer.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，则可能引发以前排序操作，<see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" />将不会引发异常，因为插入排序和 heapsort 算法不检测到无效的比较器。

trans-unit.source: For the most part, this applies to arrays with fewer than 16 elements.
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这适用于具有少于 16 个元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 数组元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to sort
trans-unit.target: 要排序的从零开始的一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The starting index of the range to sort.
trans-unit.target: 排序范围的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the range to sort.
trans-unit.target: 排序范围内的元素数。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the elements in a range of elements in an <see cref="T:System.Array" /> using the <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> generic interface implementation of each element of the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的每个元素的 <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> 泛型接口实现，对 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中某个元素范围内的元素进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Each element within the specified range of elements in `array` must implement the <xref:System.IComparable%601> generic interface to be capable of comparisons with every other element in `array`.
trans-unit.target: 指定范围中的元素内的每个元素`array`必须实现<xref:System.IComparable%601>泛型接口，才能与中的每个其他元素的比较`array`。

trans-unit.source: If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果未成功完成排序，结果不确定。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows:
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用反省排序 (introsort) 算法，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 分区大小是否少于 16 个元素，它使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)算法。

trans-unit.source: If the number of partitions exceeds 2 * Log<sup>N</sup>, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果分区数超过 2 * 日志<sup>N</sup>，其中*N*是范围的输入数组，它使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)算法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它使用[快速排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)算法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将执行不稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素相等，则可能不会保留其顺序。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等的元素的顺序。

trans-unit.source: For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 对于在最坏情况下使用 Heapsort 和快速排序算法排过序的数组，此方法为 O (`n`日志`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> generic method overload and the <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> generic method overload for sorting a range in an array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>泛型方法重载与<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>数组中的范围进行排序的泛型方法重载。

trans-unit.source: The code example defines an alternative comparer for strings, named `ReverseCompare`, which implements the `IComparer<string>` (`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer<String^>` in Visual C++) generic interface.
trans-unit.target: 代码示例定义了将可选的比较器字符串，名为`ReverseCompare`，该类实现`IComparer<string>`(`IComparer(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中， `IComparer<String^>` Visual c + +) 泛型接口。

trans-unit.source: The comparer calls the <xref:System.String.CompareTo%28System.String%29> method, reversing the order of the comparands so that the strings sort high-to-low instead of low-to-high.
trans-unit.target: 比较器调用<xref:System.String.CompareTo%28System.String%29>方法，以便字符串排序高到低而不是低到高数比较字的顺序反转。

trans-unit.source: The code example creates and displays an array of dinosaur names, consisting of three herbivores followed by three carnivores (tyrannosaurids, to be precise).
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建并显示不复存在名称，三个草食跟三个食肉恐龙 (tyrannosaurids，使之精确) 所组成的数组。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> generic method overload is used to sort the last three elements of the array, which is then displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>使用泛型方法重载的数组，随后显示的最后三个元素进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> generic method overload is used with `ReverseCompare` to sort the last three elements in reverse order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>与使用泛型方法重载`ReverseCompare`以按相反顺序进行排序的最后三个元素。

trans-unit.source: The thoroughly confused dinosaurs are displayed again.
trans-unit.target: 全面混淆历史舞台再次显示。

trans-unit.source: The calls to the <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> and <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> generic methods do not look any different from calls to their nongeneric counterparts, because Visual Basic, C#, and C++ infer the type of the generic type parameter from the type of the first argument.
trans-unit.target: 对调用<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>和<xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>泛型方法不查找任何不同于调用其非泛型对应项，因为 Visual Basic、 C# 和 c + + 来推断从第一个参数的类型的泛型类型参数的类型。

trans-unit.source: If you use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), you can see that the generic methods are being called.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)若要检查的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL)，你可以看到泛型方法正被调用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than the lower bound of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小于 <paramref name="array" /> 的下限。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> and <paramref name="length" /> do not specify a valid range in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 和 <paramref name="length" /> 未在 <paramref name="array" /> 中指定有效范围。

trans-unit.source: One or more elements in <paramref name="array" /> do not implement the <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> generic interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 中的一个或多个元素未实现 <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> 泛型接口。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: 数组元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to sort.
trans-unit.target: 要排序的从零开始的一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The starting index of the range to sort.
trans-unit.target: 排序范围的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the range to sort.
trans-unit.target: 排序范围内的元素数。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer`1" /> generic interface implementation to use when comparing elements, or <see langword="null" /> to use the <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> generic interface implementation of each element.
trans-unit.target: 比较元素时使用的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer`1" /> 泛型接口实现；如果为 <see langword="null" />，则使用每个元素的 <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> 泛型接口实现。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the elements in a range of elements in an <see cref="T:System.Array" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer`1" /> generic interface.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 泛型接口，对 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer`1" /> 中某个元素范围内的元素进行排序。

trans-unit.source: If `comparer` is `null`, each element within the specified range of elements in `array` must implement the <xref:System.IComparable%601> generic interface to be capable of comparisons with every other element in `array`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparer`是`null`，每个元素中的元素指定的范围内`array`必须实现<xref:System.IComparable%601>泛型接口，才能与中的每个其他元素的比较`array`。

trans-unit.source: If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果未成功完成排序，结果不确定。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows:
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用反省排序 (introsort) 算法，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 分区大小是否少于 16 个元素，它使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)算法。

trans-unit.source: If the number of partitions exceeds 2 * Log<sup>N</sup>, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果分区数超过 2 * 日志<sup>N</sup>，其中*N*是范围的输入数组，它使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)算法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它使用[快速排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)算法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将执行不稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素相等，则可能不会保留其顺序。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等的元素的顺序。

trans-unit.source: For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 对于在最坏情况下使用 Heapsort 和快速排序算法排过序的数组，此方法为 O (`n`日志`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> generic method overload and the <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> generic method overload for sorting a range in an array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>泛型方法重载与<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>数组中的范围进行排序的泛型方法重载。

trans-unit.source: The code example defines an alternative comparer for strings, named `ReverseCompare`, which implements the `IComparer<string>` (`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer<String^>` in Visual C++) generic interface.
trans-unit.target: 代码示例定义了将可选的比较器字符串，名为`ReverseCompare`，该类实现`IComparer<string>`(`IComparer(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中， `IComparer<String^>` Visual c + +) 泛型接口。

trans-unit.source: The comparer calls the <xref:System.String.CompareTo%28System.String%29> method, reversing the order of the comparands so that the strings sort high-to-low instead of low-to-high.
trans-unit.target: 比较器调用<xref:System.String.CompareTo%28System.String%29>方法，以便字符串排序高到低而不是低到高数比较字的顺序反转。

trans-unit.source: The code example creates and displays an array of dinosaur names, consisting of three herbivores followed by three carnivores (tyrannosaurids, to be precise).
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建并显示不复存在名称，三个草食跟三个食肉恐龙 (tyrannosaurids，使之精确) 所组成的数组。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> generic method overload is used to sort the last three elements of the array, which is then displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>使用泛型方法重载的数组，随后显示的最后三个元素进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> generic method overload is used with `ReverseCompare` to sort the last three elements in reverse order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>与使用泛型方法重载`ReverseCompare`以按相反顺序进行排序的最后三个元素。

trans-unit.source: The thoroughly confused dinosaurs are displayed again.
trans-unit.target: 全面混淆历史舞台再次显示。

trans-unit.source: The calls to the <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> and <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> generic methods do not look any different from calls to their nongeneric counterparts, because Visual Basic, C#, and C++ infer the type of the generic type parameter from the type of the first argument.
trans-unit.target: 对调用<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>和<xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>泛型方法不查找任何不同于调用其非泛型对应项，因为 Visual Basic、 C# 和 c + + 来推断从第一个参数的类型的泛型类型参数的类型。

trans-unit.source: If you use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), you can see that the generic methods are being called.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)若要检查的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL)，你可以看到泛型方法正被调用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than the lower bound of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小于 <paramref name="array" /> 的下限。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> and <paramref name="length" /> do not specify a valid range in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 和 <paramref name="length" /> 未在 <paramref name="array" /> 中指定有效范围。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <paramref name="comparer" /> caused an error during the sort.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparer" /> 的实现导致排序时出现错误。

trans-unit.source: For example, <paramref name="comparer" /> might not return 0 when comparing an item with itself.
trans-unit.target: 例如，将某个项与其自身比较时，<paramref name="comparer" /> 可能不返回 0。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="comparer" /> is <see langword="null" />, and one or more elements in <paramref name="array" /> do not implement the <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> generic interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />，并且 <paramref name="array" /> 中的一个或多个元素未实现 <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> 泛型接口。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions used only the Quicksort algorithm.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 4 和更早版本使用仅快速排序算法。

trans-unit.source: Quicksort identifies invalid comparers in some situations in which the sorting operation throws an <see cref="T:System.IndexOutOfRangeException" /> exception, and throws an <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" /> exception to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 快速排序标识无效的比较器，在某些情况下，排序操作会引发<see cref="T:System.IndexOutOfRangeException" />异常，并且将引发<see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" />异常向调用方。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], it is possible that sorting operations that previously threw <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" /> will not throw an exception, because the insertion sort and heapsort algorithms do not detect an invalid comparer.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，则可能引发以前排序操作，<see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" />将不会引发异常，因为插入排序和 heapsort 算法不检测到无效的比较器。

trans-unit.source: For the most part, this applies to arrays with fewer than 16 elements.
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这适用于具有少于 16 个元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the key array.
trans-unit.target: 关键字数组元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the items array.
trans-unit.target: 项数组元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the keys to sort.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，它包含要排序的关键字。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the items that correspond to the keys in <c>keys</c>, or <see langword="null" /> to sort only <c>keys</c>.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，其中包含与 <c>keys</c> 中的关键字对应的项；如果为 <see langword="null" />，则只对 <c>keys</c> 进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Sorts a pair of <see cref="T:System.Array" /> objects (one contains the keys and the other contains the corresponding items) based on the keys in the first <see cref="T:System.Array" /> using the <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> generic interface implementation of each key.
trans-unit.target: 基于第一个 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的关键字，使用每个关键字的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 泛型接口实现，对两个 <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> 对象（一个包含关键字，另一个包含对应的项）进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Each key in the `keys`<xref:System.Array> has a corresponding item in the `items`<xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 在每个键`keys`<xref:System.Array>都有对应项`items` <xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: When a key is repositioned during the sorting, the corresponding item in the `items`<xref:System.Array> is similarly repositioned.
trans-unit.target: 在排序中的相应项过程时重新定位密钥`items`<xref:System.Array>同样重新定位。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the `items`<xref:System.Array> is sorted according to the arrangement of the corresponding keys in the `keys`<xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 因此， `items` <xref:System.Array>根据中对应键的排列方式排序`keys` <xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: Each key in the `keys`<xref:System.Array> must implement the <xref:System.IComparable%601> generic interface to be capable of comparisons with every other key.
trans-unit.target: 在每个键`keys`<xref:System.Array>必须实现<xref:System.IComparable%601>泛型接口，才能与每个其他键的比较。

trans-unit.source: You can sort if there are more items than keys, but the items that have no corresponding keys will not be sorted.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多个项与键，但具有没有对应的键的项将不会进行排序，您可以进行排序。

trans-unit.source: You cannot sort if there are more keys than items; doing this throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多个项与项; 您不能进行排序这样做这会引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果未成功完成排序，结果不确定。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows:
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用反省排序 (introsort) 算法，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 分区大小是否少于 16 个元素，它使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)算法。

trans-unit.source: If the number of partitions exceeds 2 * Log<sup>N</sup>, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果分区数超过 2 * 日志<sup>N</sup>，其中*N*是范围的输入数组，它使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)算法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它使用[快速排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)算法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将执行不稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素相等，则可能不会保留其顺序。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等的元素的顺序。

trans-unit.source: For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 对于在最坏情况下使用 Heapsort 和快速排序算法排过序的数组，此方法为 O (`n`日志`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%29>, <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>, <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>, and <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> generic method overloads, for sorting pairs of arrays that represent keys and values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%29>， <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>， <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>，和<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>泛型方法的重载，对表示键和值的数组进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The code example defines an alternative comparer for strings, named `ReverseCompare`, which implements the `IComparer<string>` (`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer<String^>` in Visual C++) generic interface.
trans-unit.target: 代码示例定义了将可选的比较器字符串，名为`ReverseCompare`，该类实现`IComparer<string>`(`IComparer(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中， `IComparer<String^>` Visual c + +) 泛型接口。

trans-unit.source: The comparer calls the <xref:System.String.CompareTo%28System.String%29> method, reversing the order of the comparands so that the strings sort high-to-low instead of low-to-high.
trans-unit.target: 比较器调用<xref:System.String.CompareTo%28System.String%29>方法，以便字符串排序高到低而不是低到高数比较字的顺序反转。

trans-unit.source: The code example creates and displays an array of dinosaur names (the keys) and an array of integers representing the maximum length of each dinosaur in meters (the values).
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建并显示不复存在头名 （关键字） 的数组和数组表示每个不复存在以米为单位 （值） 的最大长度的整数。

trans-unit.source: The arrays are then sorted and displayed several times:
trans-unit.target: 然后，数组进行排序和显示几次：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%29> overload is used to sort both arrays in order of the dinosaur names in the first array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%29>重载用于对这两个数组中的第一个数组中的不复存在名称顺序进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> overload and an instance of `ReverseCompare` are used to reverse the sort order of the paired arrays.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>重载与实例`ReverseCompare`用于反转排序顺序的成对的数组。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> overload is used to sort the last three elements of both arrays.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>使用重载的两个数组的最后三个元素进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> overload is used to sort the last three elements of both arrays in reverse order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>重载用于按相反顺序进行排序的两个数组的最后三个元素。

trans-unit.source: The calls to the generic methods do not look any different from calls to their nongeneric counterparts, because Visual Basic, C#, and C++ infer the type of the generic type parameter from the type of the first two arguments.
trans-unit.target: 因为 Visual Basic、 C# 和 c + + 来推断与前两个参数的类型的泛型类型参数的类型对泛型方法的调用不查找从其非泛型对应项，对调用任何不同。

trans-unit.source: If you use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), you can see that the generic methods are being called.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)若要检查的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL)，你可以看到泛型方法正被调用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="keys" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keys" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="items" /> is not <see langword="null" />, and the lower bound of <paramref name="keys" /> does not match the lower bound of <paramref name="items" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="items" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，且 <paramref name="keys" /> 的下限与 <paramref name="items" /> 的下限不匹配。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="items" /> is not <see langword="null" />, and the length of <paramref name="keys" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="items" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="items" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，并且 <paramref name="keys" /> 的长度大于 <paramref name="items" /> 的长度。

trans-unit.source: One or more elements in the <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> do not implement the <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> generic interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的一个或多个元素不实现 <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> 泛型接口。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the key array.
trans-unit.target: 关键字数组元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the items array.
trans-unit.target: 项数组元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the keys to sort.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，它包含要排序的关键字。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the items that correspond to the keys in <c>keys</c>, or <see langword="null" /> to sort only <c>keys</c>.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，其中包含与 <c>keys</c> 中的关键字对应的项；如果为 <see langword="null" />，则只对 <c>keys</c> 进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer`1" /> generic interface implementation to use when comparing elements, or <see langword="null" /> to use the <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> generic interface implementation of each element.
trans-unit.target: 比较元素时使用的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer`1" /> 泛型接口实现；如果为 <see langword="null" />，则使用每个元素的 <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> 泛型接口实现。

trans-unit.source: Sorts a pair of <see cref="T:System.Array" /> objects (one contains the keys and the other contains the corresponding items) based on the keys in the first <see cref="T:System.Array" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer`1" /> generic interface.
trans-unit.target: 基于第一个 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的关键字，使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 泛型接口，对两个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer`1" /> 对象（一个包含关键字，另一个包含对应的项）进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Each key in the `keys`<xref:System.Array> has a corresponding item in the `items`<xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 在每个键`keys`<xref:System.Array>都有对应项`items` <xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: When a key is repositioned during the sorting, the corresponding item in the `items`<xref:System.Array> is similarly repositioned.
trans-unit.target: 在排序中的相应项过程时重新定位密钥`items`<xref:System.Array>同样重新定位。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the `items`<xref:System.Array> is sorted according to the arrangement of the corresponding keys in the `keys`<xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 因此， `items` <xref:System.Array>根据中对应键的排列方式排序`keys` <xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: If `comparer` is `null`, each key in the `keys`<xref:System.Array> must implement the <xref:System.IComparable%601> generic interface to be capable of comparisons with every other key.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparer`是`null`，每个密钥中`keys`<xref:System.Array>必须实现<xref:System.IComparable%601>泛型接口，才能与每个其他键的比较。

trans-unit.source: You can sort if there are more items than keys, but the items that have no corresponding keys will not be sorted.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多个项与键，但具有没有对应的键的项将不会进行排序，您可以进行排序。

trans-unit.source: You cannot sort if there are more keys than items; doing this throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多个项与项; 您不能进行排序这样做这会引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果未成功完成排序，结果不确定。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows:
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用反省排序 (introsort) 算法，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 分区大小是否少于 16 个元素，它使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)算法。

trans-unit.source: If the number of partitions exceeds 2 * Log<sup>N</sup>, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果分区数超过 2 * 日志<sup>N</sup>，其中*N*是范围的输入数组，它使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)算法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它使用[快速排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)算法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将执行不稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素相等，则可能不会保留其顺序。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等的元素的顺序。

trans-unit.source: For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> of `array`.
trans-unit.target: 对于在最坏情况下使用 Heapsort 和快速排序算法排过序的数组，此方法为 O (`n`日志`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>的`array`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%29>, [\], TValue\<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>,<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>, and <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> generic method overloads, for sorting pairs of arrays that represent keys and values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%29>，[\]，TValue\<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29 >，<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>，和<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>泛型方法的重载，对表示键和值的数组进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The code example defines an alternative comparer for strings, named `ReverseCompare`, which implements the `IComparer<string>` (`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer<String^>` in Visual C++) generic interface.
trans-unit.target: 代码示例定义了将可选的比较器字符串，名为`ReverseCompare`，该类实现`IComparer<string>`(`IComparer(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中， `IComparer<String^>` Visual c + +) 泛型接口。

trans-unit.source: The comparer calls the <xref:System.String.CompareTo%28System.String%29> method, reversing the order of the comparands so that the strings sort high-to-low instead of low-to-high.
trans-unit.target: 比较器调用<xref:System.String.CompareTo%28System.String%29>方法，以便字符串排序高到低而不是低到高数比较字的顺序反转。

trans-unit.source: The code example creates and displays an array of dinosaur names (the keys) and an array of integers representing the maximum length of each dinosaur in meters (the values).
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建并显示不复存在头名 （关键字） 的数组和数组表示每个不复存在以米为单位 （值） 的最大长度的整数。

trans-unit.source: The arrays are then sorted and displayed several times:
trans-unit.target: 然后，数组进行排序和显示几次：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%29> overload is used to sort both arrays in order of the dinosaur names in the first array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%29>重载用于对这两个数组中的第一个数组中的不复存在名称顺序进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The [\], TValue\<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> overload and an instance of `ReverseCompare` are used to reverse the sort order of the paired arrays.
trans-unit.target: [\]，TValue\<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29 > 重载与实例`ReverseCompare`用于反转排序顺序成对的数组。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> overload is used to sort the last three elements of both arrays.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>使用重载的两个数组的最后三个元素进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> overload is used to sort the last three elements of both arrays in reverse order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>重载用于按相反顺序进行排序的两个数组的最后三个元素。

trans-unit.source: The calls to the generic methods do not look any different from calls to their nongeneric counterparts, because Visual Basic, C#, and C++ infer the type of the generic type parameter from the type of the first two arguments.
trans-unit.target: 因为 Visual Basic、 C# 和 c + + 来推断与前两个参数的类型的泛型类型参数的类型对泛型方法的调用不查找从其非泛型对应项，对调用任何不同。

trans-unit.source: If you use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), you can see that the generic methods are being called.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)若要检查的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL)，你可以看到泛型方法正被调用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="keys" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keys" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="items" /> is not <see langword="null" />, and the lower bound of <paramref name="keys" /> does not match the lower bound of <paramref name="items" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="items" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，且 <paramref name="keys" /> 的下限与 <paramref name="items" /> 的下限不匹配。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="items" /> is not <see langword="null" />, and the length of <paramref name="keys" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="items" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="items" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，并且 <paramref name="keys" /> 的长度大于 <paramref name="items" /> 的长度。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <paramref name="comparer" /> caused an error during the sort.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparer" /> 的实现导致排序时出现错误。

trans-unit.source: For example, <paramref name="comparer" /> might not return 0 when comparing an item with itself.
trans-unit.target: 例如，将某个项与其自身比较时，<paramref name="comparer" /> 可能不返回 0。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="comparer" /> is <see langword="null" />, and one or more elements in the <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> do not implement the <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> generic interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />，且 <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的一个或多个元素未实现 <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> 泛型接口。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions used only the Quicksort algorithm.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 4 和更早版本使用仅快速排序算法。

trans-unit.source: Quicksort identifies invalid comparers in some situations in which the sorting operation throws an <see cref="T:System.IndexOutOfRangeException" /> exception, and throws an <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" /> exception to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 快速排序标识无效的比较器，在某些情况下，排序操作会引发<see cref="T:System.IndexOutOfRangeException" />异常，并且将引发<see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" />异常向调用方。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], it is possible that sorting operations that previously threw <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" /> will not throw an exception, because the insertion sort and heapsort algorithms do not detect an invalid comparer.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，则可能引发以前排序操作，<see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" />将不会引发异常，因为插入排序和 heapsort 算法不检测到无效的比较器。

trans-unit.source: For the most part, this applies to arrays with fewer than 16 elements.
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这适用于具有少于 16 个元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the key array.
trans-unit.target: 关键字数组元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the items array.
trans-unit.target: 项数组元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the keys to sort.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，它包含要排序的关键字。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the items that correspond to the keys in <c>keys</c>, or <see langword="null" /> to sort only <c>keys</c>.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，其中包含与 <c>keys</c> 中的关键字对应的项；如果为 <see langword="null" />，则只对 <c>keys</c> 进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The starting index of the range to sort.
trans-unit.target: 排序范围的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the range to sort.
trans-unit.target: 排序范围内的元素数。

trans-unit.source: Sorts a range of elements in a pair of <see cref="T:System.Array" /> objects (one contains the keys and the other contains the corresponding items) based on the keys in the first <see cref="T:System.Array" /> using the <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> generic interface implementation of each key.
trans-unit.target: 基于第一个 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的关键字，使用每个关键字的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 泛型接口实现，对两个 <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> 对象（一个包含关键字，另一个包含对应的项）的部分元素进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Each key in the `keys`<xref:System.Array> has a corresponding item in the `items`<xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 在每个键`keys`<xref:System.Array>都有对应项`items` <xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: When a key is repositioned during the sorting, the corresponding item in the `items`<xref:System.Array> is similarly repositioned.
trans-unit.target: 在排序中的相应项过程时重新定位密钥`items`<xref:System.Array>同样重新定位。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the `items`<xref:System.Array> is sorted according to the arrangement of the corresponding keys in the `keys`<xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 因此， `items` <xref:System.Array>根据中对应键的排列方式排序`keys` <xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: Each key within the specified range of elements in the `keys`<xref:System.Array> must implement the <xref:System.IComparable%601> generic interface to be capable of comparisons with every other key.
trans-unit.target: 指定范围中的元素内的每个键`keys`<xref:System.Array>必须实现<xref:System.IComparable%601>泛型接口，才能与每个其他键的比较。

trans-unit.source: You can sort if there are more items than keys, but the items that have no corresponding keys will not be sorted.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多个项与键，但具有没有对应的键的项将不会进行排序，您可以进行排序。

trans-unit.source: You cannot sort if there are more keys than items; doing this throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多个项与项; 您不能进行排序这样做这会引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果未成功完成排序，结果不确定。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows:
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用反省排序 (introsort) 算法，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 分区大小是否少于 16 个元素，它使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)算法。

trans-unit.source: If the number of partitions exceeds 2 * Log<sup>N</sup>, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果分区数超过 2 * 日志<sup>N</sup>，其中*N*是范围的输入数组，它使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)算法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它使用[快速排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)算法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将执行不稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素相等，则可能不会保留其顺序。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等的元素的顺序。

trans-unit.source: For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 对于在最坏情况下使用 Heapsort 和快速排序算法排过序的数组，此方法为 O (`n`日志`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%29>, <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>, [\], TValue\<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>, and <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> generic method overloads, for sorting pairs of arrays that represent keys and values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%29>， <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>，[\]，TValue\<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29 >，和<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>泛型方法重载，对表示键和值的数组进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The code example defines an alternative comparer for strings, named `ReverseCompare`, which implements the `IComparer<string>` (`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer<String^>` in Visual C++) generic interface.
trans-unit.target: 代码示例定义了将可选的比较器字符串，名为`ReverseCompare`，该类实现`IComparer<string>`(`IComparer(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中， `IComparer<String^>` Visual c + +) 泛型接口。

trans-unit.source: The comparer calls the <xref:System.String.CompareTo%28System.String%29> method, reversing the order of the comparands so that the strings sort high-to-low instead of low-to-high.
trans-unit.target: 比较器调用<xref:System.String.CompareTo%28System.String%29>方法，以便字符串排序高到低而不是低到高数比较字的顺序反转。

trans-unit.source: The code example creates and displays an array of dinosaur names (the keys) and an array of integers representing the maximum length of each dinosaur in meters (the values).
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建并显示不复存在头名 （关键字） 的数组和数组表示每个不复存在以米为单位 （值） 的最大长度的整数。

trans-unit.source: The arrays are then sorted and displayed several times:
trans-unit.target: 然后，数组进行排序和显示几次：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%29> overload is used to sort both arrays in order of the dinosaur names in the first array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%29>重载用于对这两个数组中的第一个数组中的不复存在名称顺序进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> overload and an instance of `ReverseCompare` are used to reverse the sort order of the paired arrays.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>重载与实例`ReverseCompare`用于反转排序顺序的成对的数组。

trans-unit.source: The [\], TValue\<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> overload is used to sort the last three elements of both arrays.
trans-unit.target: [\]，TValue\<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29 > 使用重载的两个数组的最后三个元素进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> overload is used to sort the last three elements of both arrays in reverse order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>重载用于按相反顺序进行排序的两个数组的最后三个元素。

trans-unit.source: The calls to the generic methods do not look any different from calls to their nongeneric counterparts, because Visual Basic, C#, and C++ infer the type of the generic type parameter from the type of the first two arguments.
trans-unit.target: 因为 Visual Basic、 C# 和 c + + 来推断与前两个参数的类型的泛型类型参数的类型对泛型方法的调用不查找从其非泛型对应项，对调用任何不同。

trans-unit.source: If you use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), you can see that the generic methods are being called.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)若要检查的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL)，你可以看到泛型方法正被调用。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keys" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="items" /> is not <see langword="null" />, and the lower bound of <paramref name="keys" /> does not match the lower bound of <paramref name="items" />.

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="items" /> is not <see langword="null" />, and the length of <paramref name="keys" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="items" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="items" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，并且 <paramref name="keys" /> 的长度大于 <paramref name="items" /> 的长度。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> and <paramref name="length" /> do not specify a valid range in the <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 和 <paramref name="length" /> 未在 <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中指定有效范围。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="items" /> is not <see langword="null" />, and <paramref name="index" /> and <paramref name="length" /> do not specify a valid range in the <paramref name="items" /><see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="items" /> 不为 <see langword="null" />，且 <paramref name="index" /> 和 <paramref name="length" /> 未在 <paramref name="items" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中指定有效范围。

trans-unit.source: One or more elements in the <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> do not implement the <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> generic interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的一个或多个元素不实现 <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> 泛型接口。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the key array.
trans-unit.target: 关键字数组元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the items array.
trans-unit.target: 项数组元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the keys to sort.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，它包含要排序的关键字。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional, zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that contains the items that correspond to the keys in <c>keys</c>, or <see langword="null" /> to sort only <c>keys</c>.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，其中包含与 <c>keys</c> 中的关键字对应的项；如果为 <see langword="null" />，则只对 <c>keys</c> 进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The starting index of the range to sort.
trans-unit.target: 排序范围的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the range to sort.
trans-unit.target: 排序范围内的元素数。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer`1" /> generic interface implementation to use when comparing elements, or <see langword="null" /> to use the <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> generic interface implementation of each element.
trans-unit.target: 比较元素时使用的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer`1" /> 泛型接口实现；如果为 <see langword="null" />，则使用每个元素的 <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> 泛型接口实现。

trans-unit.source: Sorts a range of elements in a pair of <see cref="T:System.Array" /> objects (one contains the keys and the other contains the corresponding items) based on the keys in the first <see cref="T:System.Array" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer`1" /> generic interface.
trans-unit.target: 基于第一个 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的关键字，使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 泛型接口，对两个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer`1" /> 对象（一个包含关键字，另一个包含对应的项）的部分元素进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Each key in the `keys`<xref:System.Array> has a corresponding item in the `items`<xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 在每个键`keys`<xref:System.Array>都有对应项`items` <xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: When a key is repositioned during the sorting, the corresponding item in the `items`<xref:System.Array> is similarly repositioned.
trans-unit.target: 在排序中的相应项过程时重新定位密钥`items`<xref:System.Array>同样重新定位。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the `items`<xref:System.Array> is sorted according to the arrangement of the corresponding keys in the `keys`<xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 因此， `items` <xref:System.Array>根据中对应键的排列方式排序`keys` <xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: If `comparer` is `null`, each key within the specified range of elements in the `keys`<xref:System.Array> must implement the <xref:System.IComparable%601> generic interface to be capable of comparisons with every other key.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparer`是`null`中的元素指定的范围内的每个键`keys`<xref:System.Array>必须实现<xref:System.IComparable%601>泛型接口，才能与每个其他键的比较。

trans-unit.source: You can sort if there are more items than keys, but the items that have no corresponding keys will not be sorted.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多个项与键，但具有没有对应的键的项将不会进行排序，您可以进行排序。

trans-unit.source: You cannot sort if there are more keys than items; doing this throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多个项与项; 您不能进行排序这样做这会引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果未成功完成排序，结果不确定。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows:
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用反省排序 (introsort) 算法，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 分区大小是否少于 16 个元素，它使用[插入排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)算法。

trans-unit.source: If the number of partitions exceeds 2 * Log<sup>N</sup>, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果分区数超过 2 * 日志<sup>N</sup>，其中*N*是范围的输入数组，它使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)算法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它使用[快速排序](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)算法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将执行不稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素相等，则可能不会保留其顺序。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等的元素的顺序。

trans-unit.source: For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.
trans-unit.target: 对于在最坏情况下使用 Heapsort 和快速排序算法排过序的数组，此方法为 O (`n`日志`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`length`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%29>, <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>, <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>, and [\], TValue\<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> generic method overloads, for sorting pairs of arrays that represent keys and values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%29>， <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>， <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>，和 [\]，TValue\<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29 > 泛型方法的重载，对表示键和值的数组进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The code example defines an alternative comparer for strings, named `ReverseCompare`, which implements the `IComparer<string>`(`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer<String^>` in Visual C++) generic interface.
trans-unit.target: 代码示例定义了将可选的比较器字符串，名为`ReverseCompare`，该类实现`IComparer<string>`(`IComparer(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中， `IComparer<String^>` Visual c + +) 泛型接口。

trans-unit.source: The comparer calls the <xref:System.String.CompareTo%28System.String%29> method, reversing the order of the comparands so that the strings sort high-to-low instead of low-to-high.
trans-unit.target: 比较器调用<xref:System.String.CompareTo%28System.String%29>方法，以便字符串排序高到低而不是低到高数比较字的顺序反转。

trans-unit.source: The code example creates and displays an array of dinosaur names (the keys) and an array of integers representing the maximum length of each dinosaur in meters (the values).
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建并显示不复存在头名 （关键字） 的数组和数组表示每个不复存在以米为单位 （值） 的最大长度的整数。

trans-unit.source: The arrays are then sorted and displayed several times:
trans-unit.target: 然后，数组进行排序和显示几次：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%29> overload is used to sort both arrays in order of the dinosaur names in the first array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%29>重载用于对这两个数组中的第一个数组中的不复存在名称顺序进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> overload and an instance of `ReverseCompare` are used to reverse the sort order of the paired arrays.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>重载与实例`ReverseCompare`用于反转排序顺序的成对的数组。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> overload is used to sort the last three elements of both arrays.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>使用重载的两个数组的最后三个元素进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The [\], TValue\<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> overload is used to sort the last three elements of both arrays in reverse order.
trans-unit.target: [\]，TValue\<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%602%28%60%600%5B%5D%2C%60%601%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29 > 使用重载进行排序最后三个这两个元素的数组按相反的顺序。

trans-unit.source: The calls to the generic methods do not look any different from calls to their nongeneric counterparts, because Visual Basic, C#, and C++ infer the type of the generic type parameter from the type of the first two arguments.
trans-unit.target: 因为 Visual Basic、 C# 和 c + + 来推断与前两个参数的类型的泛型类型参数的类型对泛型方法的调用不查找从其非泛型对应项，对调用任何不同。

trans-unit.source: If you use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), you can see that the generic methods are being called.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)若要检查的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL)，你可以看到泛型方法正被调用。

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <paramref name="comparer" /> caused an error during the sort.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparer" /> 的实现导致排序时出现错误。

trans-unit.source: For example, <paramref name="comparer" /> might not return 0 when comparing an item with itself.
trans-unit.target: 例如，将某个项与其自身比较时，<paramref name="comparer" /> 可能不返回 0。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="comparer" /> is <see langword="null" />, and one or more elements in the <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> do not implement the <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> generic interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />，且 <paramref name="keys" /><see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的一个或多个元素未实现 <see cref="T:System.IComparable`1" /> 泛型接口。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions used only the Quicksort algorithm.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 4 和更早版本使用仅快速排序算法。

trans-unit.source: Quicksort identifies invalid comparers in some situations in which the sorting operation throws an <see cref="T:System.IndexOutOfRangeException" /> exception, and throws an <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" /> exception to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 快速排序标识无效的比较器，在某些情况下，排序操作会引发<see cref="T:System.IndexOutOfRangeException" />异常，并且将引发<see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" />异常向调用方。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], it is possible that sorting operations that previously threw <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" /> will not throw an exception, because the insertion sort and heapsort algorithms do not detect an invalid comparer.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，则可能引发以前排序操作，<see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" />将不会引发异常，因为插入排序和 heapsort 算法不检测到无效的比较器。

trans-unit.source: For the most part, this applies to arrays with fewer than 16 elements.
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这适用于具有少于 16 个元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取可用于同步对 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 可用于同步对 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: This property implements the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此属性实现<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>接口。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework classes based on <xref:System.Array> provide their own synchronized version of the collection using the <xref:System.Array.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 类基于<xref:System.Array>提供其自己的同步的版本的集合使用<xref:System.Array.SyncRoot%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Classes that use arrays can also implement their own synchronization using the <xref:System.Array.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用数组的类还可以实现自己的同步使用<xref:System.Array.SyncRoot%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The synchronizing code must perform operations on the `SyncRoot` of the collection, not directly on the collection.
trans-unit.target: 同步代码必须在执行操作`SyncRoot`不是直接对集合的集合。

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the collection.
trans-unit.target: 具体地说，这样可保持正确的同步，与可能同时修改集合的其他线程。

trans-unit.source: Note that some implementations of <xref:System.Array.SyncRoot%2A> might return the <xref:System.Array> itself.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，某些实现的<xref:System.Array.SyncRoot%2A>可能会返回<xref:System.Array>本身。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举整个集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to lock an array during the entire enumeration by using the <xref:System.Array.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何通过使用在整个枚举过程中锁定数组<xref:System.Array.SyncRoot%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of elements contained in the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中包含的元素数。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中包含的元素数。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Array> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Array> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: The object to be added to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 的对象。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method always throws a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" /> exception.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法始终会引发 <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" /> 异常。

trans-unit.source: Adding a value to an array is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持向数组添加值。

trans-unit.source: No value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 不返回任何值。

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily, an <xref:System.Collections.IList.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation adds a member to a collection.
trans-unit.target: 通常，<xref:System.Collections.IList.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>实现将成员添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: However, because arrays have a fixed size (the <xref:System.Array.IsFixedSize%2A> property always returns `true`), this method always throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 但是，因为数组具有固定的大小 (<xref:System.Array.IsFixedSize%2A>属性始终返回`true`)，此方法始终引发<xref:System.NotSupportedException>异常。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Array> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Array> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 具有固定的大小。

trans-unit.source: Removes all items from the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 中移除所有项。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: An object that compares the current object and <c>other</c>.
trans-unit.target: 一个将当前对象与 <c>other</c> 进行比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current collection object precedes, occurs in the same position as, or follows another object in the sort order.
trans-unit.target: 确定当前集合对象在排序顺序中的位置是位于另一个对象之前、之后还是与其位置相同。

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the relationship of the current collection object to other, as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 一个指示当前集合对象与其他对象的关系的整数，如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Return value
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> 返回值

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Description
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 描述

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term> -1
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term> -1

trans-unit.source: </term><description> The current instance precedes <paramref name="other" />.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 当前实例位于 <paramref name="other" /> 之前。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> 0
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 0

trans-unit.source: </term><description> The current instance and <paramref name="other" /> are equal.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 当前实例和 <paramref name="other" /> 相等。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> 1
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 1

trans-unit.source: </term><description> The current instance follows <paramref name="other" />.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 当前实例位于 <paramref name="other" /> 之后。
